personnel_post_title, tbl_class.id AS class_id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.id AS course_id, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, tbl_class.n_h_duration AS class_h_duration, substr(tbl_class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_term.c_code AS term_code, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title_fa, tbl_term.id AS term_id, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_complex_title, view_active_personnel.company_name AS personnel_company_name, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_ccp_area, department.c_moavenat_title AS personnel_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS personnel_ccp_affairs, department.c_vahed_title AS personnel_ccp_unit, department.c_ghesmat_title AS personnel_ccp_section, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_grade_title, tbl_post_grade.id AS personnel_post_grade_id, CASE WHEN view_personnel_course_na_report.na_priority_id IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' END AS coursetype, view_personnel_course_na_report.na_priority_id AS na_priority_id FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_class WHERE c_status IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ) ) tbl_class INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_class.f_course INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_term.id = tbl_class.f_term INNER JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class_student.class_id = tbl_class.id INNER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_student.id = tbl_class_student.student_id INNER JOIN view_active_personnel ON view_active_personnel.national_code = tbl_student.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = view_active_personnel.f_department_id LEFT JOIN view_personnel_course_na_report ON view_active_personnel.id = view_personnel_course_na_report.personnel_id AND tbl_course.id = view_personnel_course_na_report.course_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON view_active_personnel.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade ON tbl_post.f_post_grade_id = tbl_post_grade.id UNION ALL
SELECT tbl_class.c_status AS class_status, tbl_personnel_registered.id AS personnel_id, tbl_personnel_registered.emp_no AS personnel_emp_no, tbl_personnel_registered.personnel_no AS personnel_personnel_no, tbl_personnel_registered.national_code AS personnel_national_code, tbl_personnel_registered.first_name AS personnel_first_name, tbl_personnel_registered.last_name AS personnel_last_name, tbl_post.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_title, tbl_class.id AS class_id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.id AS course_id, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, tbl_class.n_h_duration AS class_h_duration, substr(tbl_class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_term.c_code AS term_code, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title_fa, tbl_term.id AS term_id, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_complex_title, tbl_personnel_registered.company_name AS personnel_company_name, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_cccp_area, department.c_moavenat_title AS personnel_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS ccp_affairs, department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, department.c_ghesmat_title AS personnel_ccp_section, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_grade_title, tbl_post_grade.id AS personnel_post_grade_id, NULL AS coursetype, NULL AS na_priority_id FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_class WHERE c_status IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ) ) tbl_class INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_class.f_course INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_term.id = tbl_class.f_term INNER JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class_student.class_id = tbl_class.id INNER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_student.id = tbl_class_student.student_id INNER JOIN tbl_personnel_registered ON tbl_personnel_registered.national_code = tbl_student.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = tbl_personnel_registered.f_department_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_personnel_registered.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade ON tbl_post.f_post_grade_id = tbl_post_grade.id

changeSet.author: nick (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT rowNum as id, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_FirstName, personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_LastName, CONCAT(CONCAT(personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA, ' '), personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA) as teacher_FullName, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.f_cancel_class_reason as class_cancel_reason_id, parameterValue.C_TITLE as class_cancel_reason_title, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by, tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.ID as tclass_id, evaluationanalysis.ID as evaluationanalysis_id, unit.ID as unit_id, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.C_EVALUATION as tclass_evaluation, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE, 1, 4) as tclass_year, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.E_TECHNICAL_TYPE as course_technical_type, course.E_RUN_TYPE as course_run_type, course.E_THEO_TYPE as course_theo_type, course.E_LEVEL_TYPE as course_level_type, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, plnner_dep.C_MOJTAME_TITLE as planner_complex, CONCAT(CONCAT(personelPlanner.FIRST_NAME, ' '), personelPlanner.LAST_NAME) as planner_name, organizer_ins.C_TITLE_FA as institute_name, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_BEHAVIORAL_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_EFFECTIVENESS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_LEARNING_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_REACTION_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_RESULTS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_TEACHER_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, STATISTICS_.PRESENCE, STATISTICS_.ABSENCE, STATISTICS_.UNKNOWN FROM TBL_CLASS tclass INNER JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TARGET_SOCIETY unit ON unit.F_CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_EVALUATION_ANALYSIS evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.F_TCLASS = tclass.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON tclass.F_TEACHER = teacher.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personal ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personal.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_personnel personelPlanner on personelPlanner.id = tclass.f_planner LEFT JOIN tbl_department plnner_dep on plnner_dep.id = personelPlanner.f_department_id LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE organizer_ins on tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER = organizer_ins.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE parameterValue on tclass.f_cancel_class_reason = parameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT att_state, f_class_id, s_hour FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN ( att.c_state = 1 OR att.c_state = 2 ) THEN 'PRESENCE' WHEN ( att.c_state = 3 OR att.c_state = 4 ) THEN 'ABSENCE' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS att_state, att.f_session, att.f_student, sess.f_class_id, sess.s_hour FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN ( SELECT ( to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number (regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 1, 1)) - ( to_number(regexp_substr (c_session_start_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_start_hour , '[^:]+', 1, 1)) ) ) / 60 AS s_hour, id, f_class_id FROM tbl_session ) sess ON ( att.f_session = sess.id ) ) ) PIVOT ( SUM ( s_hour ) FOR att_state IN ( 'PRESENCE' AS presence, 'ABSENCE' AS absence, 'UNKNOWN' AS unknown ) ) ) STATISTICS_ on(tclass.id = STATISTICS_.f_class_id)

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, cl.c_code AS class_code, cl.c_status AS class_status, cl.c_start_date AS class_start_date, cl.c_end_date AS class_end_date, co.c_code AS course_code, co.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, cs.status_reaction AS class_student_status_reaction, ea.c_reaction_grade AS evaluation_analysis_reaction_grade, ea.b_reaction_pass AS evaluation_analysis_reaction_pass, ea.c_teacher_grade AS evaluation_analysis_teacher_grade, ea.b_teacher_pass AS evaluation_analysis_teacher_pass FROM tbl_class cl INNER JOIN tbl_course co ON cl.f_course = co.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = co.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = co.subcategory_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id AS class_id, SUM( CASE WHEN tbl_class_student.evaluation_status_reaction = 2 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) AS status_reaction FROM tbl_class_student GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) cs ON cl.id = cs.class_id INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis ea ON cl.id = ea.f_tclass

changeSet.author: zare
changeSet.createView: SELECT TR_POST.ID, TR_POST.C_CREATED_BY, TR_POST.D_CREATED_DATE, TR_POST.E_DELETED, TR_POST.E_ENABLED, TR_POST.C_LAST_MODIFIED_BY, TR_POST.D_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, TR_POST.N_VERSION, TR_POST.C_CODE, TR_POST.C_TITLE_FA, TR_POST.C_AFFAIRS, TR_POST.C_AREA, TR_POST.C_MOJTAME_TITLE, TR_POST.C_ASSISTANCE, TR_POST.C_COST_CENTER_TITLE_FA, TR_POST.C_COST_CENTER_CODE, TR_POST.C_SECTION, TR_POST.C_UNIT, TR_POST.F_DEPARTMENT_ID, TR_POST.F_POST_GRADE_ID, TR_POST.F_JOB_ID, TR_POST.D_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE_NA, TR_POST.C_MODIFIED_BY_NA, TR_POST.C_PEOPLE_TYPE, J.C_TITLE_FA AS JOB_C_TITLE_FA, J.C_CODE AS JOB_C_CODE, PG.C_TITLE_FA AS POST_GRADE_C_TITLE_FA, PG.C_CODE AS POST_GRADE_C_CODE, NVL(NA.N_COMPETENCE_COUNT, 0) AS N_COMPETENCE_COUNT, NVL(PRS_COUNT.N_PERSONNEL_COUNT, 0) AS N_PERSONNEL_COUNT FROM TBL_TRAINING_POST TR_POST LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB J ON J.ID = TR_POST.F_JOB_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_POST_GRADE PG ON PG.ID = TR_POST.F_POST_GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT F_TRAINING_POST_ID, COUNT(*) AS N_PERSONNEL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT POST.ID AS POST_ID, PRS.ID AS PRS_ID, PTP.F_TRAINING_POST_ID AS F_TRAINING_POST_ID FROM TBL_POST_TRAINING_POST PTP INNER JOIN TBL_POST POST ON POST.ID = PTP.F_POST_ID INNER JOIN TBL_PERSONNEL PRS ON ( POST.ID = PRS.F_POST_ID AND PRS.DELETED = 0 ) ) GROUP BY F_TRAINING_POST_ID ) PRS_COUNT ON PRS_COUNT.F_TRAINING_POST_ID = TR_POST.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT F_OBJECT AS TR_POST_ID, COUNT(DISTINCT F_COMPETENCE) AS N_COMPETENCE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT C_OBJECT_TYPE, F_OBJECT, F_COMPETENCE FROM TBL_NEEDS_ASSESSMENT WHERE C_OBJECT_TYPE = 'TrainingPost' AND E_ENABLED IS NULL AND E_DELETED IS NULL ) GROUP BY F_OBJECT ) NA ON NA.TR_POST_ID = TR_POST.ID

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT prs.id AS personnel_id, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 111 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS essential_service, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 111 and na_passed.is_passed = 216 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS essential_service_passed, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 574 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS essential_appointment, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 574 and na_passed.is_passed = 216 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS essential_appointment_passed, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 112 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS improving, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 112 and na_passed.is_passed = 216 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS improving_passed, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 113 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS developmental, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.na_priority_id = 113 and na_passed.is_passed = 216 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS developmental_passed, NVL(SUM(course.n_theory_duration),0) AS duration, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN na_passed.is_passed = 216 THEN course.n_theory_duration ELSE 0 END),0) AS passed FROM VIEW_ACTIVE_PERSONNEL prs LEFT JOIN view_personnel_course_passed_na_report na_passed on na_passed.personnel_id = prs.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course course ON course.id = na_passed.course_id GROUP BY prs.id

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tClass.ID AS class_id, tClass.C_CODE AS class_code, tClass.C_STATUS AS class_status, tClass.C_START_DATE AS class_start_date, tClass.C_END_DATE AS class_end_date, course.ID AS course_id, course.C_CODE AS course_code, course.C_TITLE_FA AS course_titlefa, cat.C_TITLE_FA AS category_titlefa, suCat.C_TITLE_FA AS sub_category_titlefa FROM TBL_CLASS tClass INNER JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON TCLASS.F_COURSE = course.ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY cat ON cat.ID = course.CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN TBL_SUB_CATEGORY suCat ON suCat.ID = course.SUBCATEGORY_ID WHERE tClass.C_STATUS != '1'

changeSet.author: nick (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT rowNum as id, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_FirstName, personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_LastName, CONCAT(CONCAT(personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA, ' '), personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA) as teacher_FullName, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.f_cancel_class_reason as class_cancel_reason_id, parameterValue.C_TITLE as class_cancel_reason_title, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by, tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.ID as tclass_id, evaluationanalysis.ID as evaluationanalysis_id, unit.ID as unit_id, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.C_EVALUATION as tclass_evaluation, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.f_holding_class_type_id as holding_class_type_id, holdingClassTypParameterValue.C_TITLE as holding_class_type_title, tclass.f_teaching_method_id as teaching_method_id, teachingMethodParameterValue.C_TITLE as teaching_method_title, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE, 1, 4) as tclass_year, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.E_TECHNICAL_TYPE as course_technical_type, course.E_RUN_TYPE as course_run_type, course.E_THEO_TYPE as course_theo_type, course.E_LEVEL_TYPE as course_level_type, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, plnner_dep.C_MOJTAME_TITLE as planner_complex, plnner_dep.C_MOAVENAT_TITLE as planner_assistant, plnner_dep.C_OMOR_TITLE as planner_affairs, plnner_dep.C_GHESMAT_TITLE as planner_section, plnner_dep.C_VAHED_TITLE as planner_unit, CONCAT(CONCAT(personelPlanner.FIRST_NAME, ' '), personelPlanner.LAST_NAME) as planner_name, organizer_ins.C_TITLE_FA as institute_name, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_BEHAVIORAL_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_EFFECTIVENESS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_LEARNING_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_REACTION_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_RESULTS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_TEACHER_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, STATISTICS_.PRESENCE, STATISTICS_.ABSENCE, STATISTICS_.UNKNOWN FROM TBL_CLASS tclass INNER JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TARGET_SOCIETY unit ON unit.F_CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_EVALUATION_ANALYSIS evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.F_TCLASS = tclass.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON tclass.F_TEACHER = teacher.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personal ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personal.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_personnel personelPlanner on personelPlanner.id = tclass.f_planner LEFT JOIN tbl_department plnner_dep on plnner_dep.id = personelPlanner.f_department_id LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE organizer_ins on tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER = organizer_ins.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE parameterValue on tclass.f_cancel_class_reason = parameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE holdingClassTypParameterValue on tclass.f_holding_class_type_id = holdingClassTypParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE teachingMethodParameterValue on tclass.f_teaching_method_id = teachingMethodParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT att_state, f_class_id, s_hour FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (att.c_state = 1 OR att.c_state = 2) THEN 'PRESENCE' WHEN (att.c_state = 3 OR att.c_state = 4) THEN 'ABSENCE' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS att_state, att.f_session, att.f_student, sess.f_class_id, sess.s_hour FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN ( SELECT (to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number (regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 1, 1)) - (to_number(regexp_substr (c_session_start_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_start_hour , '[^:]+', 1, 1)))) / 60 AS s_hour, id, f_class_id FROM tbl_session ) sess ON (att.f_session = sess.id) ) ) PIVOT ( SUM(s_hour) FOR att_state IN ( 'PRESENCE' AS presence, 'ABSENCE' AS absence, 'UNKNOWN' AS unknown ) ) ) STATISTICS_ on (tclass.id = STATISTICS_.f_class_id)

changeSet.author: nick (generated)
changeSet.createView:
SELECT DISTINCT SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN ( '1', '2' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24, 1) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN ( '1', '2' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_minute, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN ( '3', '4' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24, 1) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN ( '3', '4' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_minute, class.id AS class_id, class.c_code AS class_code, class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, class.F_HOLDING_CLASS_TYPE_ID As holding_class_type_id, holdingClassTypParameterValue.C_TITLE As holding_class_type_title, class.F_TEACHING_METHOD_ID As teaching_method_id, teachingMethodParameterValue.C_TITLE As teaching_method_title, csession.c_session_date AS session_session_date, std.id AS student_id, std.emp_no AS student_emp_no, std.personnel_no AS student_personnel_no, std.national_code AS student_national_code, std.first_name AS student_first_name, std.last_name AS student_last_name, class_std.applicant_company_name AS class_student_applicant_company_name, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_complex_title, department.c_moavenat_title AS student_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS student_ccp_affairs, department.c_ghesmat_title AS student_ccp_section, department.c_vahed_title AS student_ccp_unit, course.id AS course_id, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, course.category_id AS course_category_id, CASE WHEN course.e_run_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_run_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_run_type = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN course.e_run_type = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN course.e_run_type = 5 THEN ' ' WHEN course.e_run_type = 6 THEN '' WHEN course.e_run_type = 7 THEN ' ' WHEN course.e_run_type = 8 THEN '' WHEN course.e_run_type = 9 THEN '' WHEN course.e_run_type = 10 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END AS course_run_type, CASE WHEN course.e_theo_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 3 THEN '_' ELSE NULL END AS course_theo_type, CASE WHEN course.e_level_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_level_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_level_type = 3 THEN '' WHEN course.e_level_type = 4 THEN '' ELSE NULL END AS course_level_type, CASE WHEN course.e_technical_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_technical_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_technical_type = 3 THEN '' ELSE NULL END AS course_technical_type, institute.id AS institute_id, institute.c_title_fa AS institute_c_title_fa FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN tbl_student std ON att.f_student = std.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT view_active_personnel.personnel_no, view_active_personnel.national_code, view_active_personnel.complex_title, view_active_personnel.work_place_title, view_active_personnel.post_grade_title, view_active_personnel.job_title, view_active_personnel.f_department_id FROM view_active_personnel UNION ALL SELECT tbl_personnel_registered.personnel_no, tbl_personnel_registered.national_code, tbl_personnel_registered.complex_title, tbl_personnel_registered.work_place_title, tbl_personnel_registered.post_grade_title, tbl_personnel_registered.job_title, tbl_personnel_registered.f_department_id FROM tbl_personnel_registered ) personnel ON std.national_code = personnel.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = personnel.f_department_id INNER JOIN tbl_session csession ON att.f_session = csession.id INNER JOIN tbl_class class ON csession.f_class_id = class.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute institute ON class.f_institute_organizer = institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON class.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student class_std ON class_std.student_id = std.id AND class_std.class_id = class.id LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE holdingClassTypParameterValue on class.f_holding_class_type_id = holdingClassTypParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE teachingMethodParameterValue on class.f_teaching_method_id = teachingMethodParameterValue.ID
GROUP BY class.id, class.c_start_date, class.c_end_date, csession.c_session_date, std.id, std.emp_no, std.personnel_no, std.national_code, std.first_name, std.last_name, class_std.applicant_company_name, department.c_hoze_title, department.c_moavenat_title, department.c_omor_title, department.c_ghesmat_title, department.c_vahed_title, class.c_code, course.id, course.c_code, course.c_title_fa, class.F_HOLDING_CLASS_TYPE_ID, holdingClassTypParameterValue.C_TITLE, class.F_TEACHING_METHOD_ID, teachingMethodParameterValue.C_TITLE, institute.c_title_fa, course.category_id, course.e_run_type, course.e_theo_type, course.e_level_type, course.e_technical_type, institute.id

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT csession.c_session_date AS session_session_date, class.id AS class_id, std.id AS student_id, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1','2' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24,1) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1','2' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_minute, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3','4' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24,1) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3','4' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_minute, class.c_code AS class_code, class.c_status AS class_status, class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, class.c_teaching_type AS class_c_teaching_type, class.c_reason AS class_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id AS class_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id AS class_holding_class_type_id, substr(class.c_start_date,1,4) AS class_year, class.f_planner AS tclass_planner, class.f_supervisor AS tclass_supervisor, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, course.e_technical_type AS course_e_technical_type, class.n_h_duration AS course_duration, CASE WHEN course.e_theo_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 3 THEN '_' ELSE NULL END AS course_theo_type, category.id AS coursecategory, subcategory.id AS coursesubcategory, std.emp_no AS student_emp_no, std.personnel_no AS student_personnel_no, std.national_code AS student_national_code, std.first_name AS student_first_name, std.last_name AS student_last_name, department.c_moavenat_title AS student_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS student_ccp_affairs, department.c_ghesmat_title AS student_ccp_section, department.c_vahed_title AS student_ccp_unit, class_std.applicant_company_name AS class_student_applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title AS personnel_complex_title, personnel.work_place_title AS student_work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa AS student_post_grade_title, tbl_job.c_title_fa AS student_job_title, personal.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_firstname, personal.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_lastname, teacher.b_personnel AS course_teacher_status, teacher.id AS course_teacher_id, institute.id AS institute_id, institute.c_title_fa AS institute_c_title_fa, term.id AS term_id, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN tbl_student std ON att.f_student = std.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT view_active_personnel.personnel_no, view_active_personnel.national_code, view_active_personnel.complex_title, view_active_personnel.work_place_title, view_active_personnel.post_grade_title, view_active_personnel.f_post_id, view_active_personnel.f_department_id FROM view_active_personnel UNION ALL SELECT tbl_personnel_registered.personnel_no, tbl_personnel_registered.national_code, tbl_personnel_registered.complex_title, tbl_personnel_registered.work_place_title, tbl_personnel_registered.post_grade_title, tbl_personnel_registered.f_post_id, tbl_personnel_registered.f_department_id FROM tbl_personnel_registered ) personnel ON std.national_code = personnel.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = personnel.f_department_id INNER JOIN tbl_session csession ON att.f_session = csession.id INNER JOIN tbl_class class ON csession.f_class_id = class.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute institute ON class.f_institute_organizer = institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON class.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_term term ON class.f_term = term.id INNER JOIN tbl_category category ON course.category_id = category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category subcategory ON course.subcategory_id = subcategory.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON class.f_teacher = teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personal ON teacher.f_personality = personal.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student class_std ON class_std.student_id = std.id AND class_std.class_id = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON personnel.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_job ON tbl_job.id = tbl_post.f_job_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade ON tbl_post_grade.id = tbl_post.f_post_grade_id LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = class.id GROUP BY class.id, class.c_start_date, class.c_end_date, csession.c_session_date, std.id, std.emp_no, std.personnel_no, std.national_code, std.first_name, std.last_name, class_std.applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title, personnel.work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa, tbl_job.c_title_fa, department.c_moavenat_title, department.c_omor_title, department.c_ghesmat_title, department.c_vahed_title, class.c_code, course.id, course.c_code, course.c_title_fa, course.e_technical_type, class.c_teaching_type, class.c_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id, class.c_status, institute.c_title_fa, institute.id, course.category_id, course.e_run_type, course.e_theo_type, course.e_level_type, category.id, subcategory.id, teacher.id, teacher.b_personnel, personal.c_first_name_fa, personal.c_last_name_fa, term.c_title_fa, term.id, class.f_planner, class.f_supervisor, class.n_h_duration, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT DISTINCT
tbl_personnel.personnel_no AS per_num, tbl_personnel.emp_no AS empnum, tbl_personnel.post_code AS post_code, tbl_personnel.first_name AS name, tbl_personnel.last_name AS lastname, tbl_personnel.post_title AS post, tbl_personnel.national_code AS national_code, s.course_code AS course_code, s.course_title AS course_title, tbl_skill.c_title_fa AS skill, tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS Priority FROM tbl_personnel INNER JOIN ( SELECT tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_code AS object_code, tbl_needs_assessment.id AS z, tbl_needs_assessment.f_skill AS skil_id, tbl_needs_assessment.f_parameter_value_needs_assessment_priority AS per, tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type AS type, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_title FROM tbl_needs_assessment INNER JOIN tbl_skill ON tbl_needs_assessment.f_skill = tbl_skill.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_skill.f_course = tbl_course.id WHERE tbl_needs_assessment.e_deleted IS NULL ) s ON ( ( tbl_personnel.post_code = s.object_code OR regexp_substr(tbl_personnel.post_code, '\d*') = s.object_code ) ) INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.c_code = s.course_code INNER JOIN tbl_skill ON s.skil_id = tbl_skill.id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_parameter_value.id = s.per WHERE tbl_personnel.post_code IS NOT NULL AND tbl_personnel.deleted != '1'

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT substr(act_ru_task.description_, - least(length(act_ru_task.description_), 8)) AS code, act_ru_task.description_ as des, act_ru_task.assignee_ as assignee, act_ru_task.create_time_ as time FROM act_ru_task WHERE act_ru_task.name_ = ' '

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT tbl_class.c_code as class_code, tbl_class.c_title_class as class_title, tbl_class.c_start_date as start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date as end_date, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa as first_name, tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa as last_name, tbl_evaluation.c_description as des, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS title_category, tbl_category.id AS id_category, tbl_sub_category.id AS id_sub_category, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS title_sub_category, tbl_evaluation.id AS id FROM tbl_evaluation INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation.f_class_id = tbl_class.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_id = tbl_teacher.id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id WHERE tbl_evaluation.c_description IS NOT NULL AND tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id = '187'

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT tbl_evaluation.c_description as des, tbl_class.c_code as class_code, tbl_class.c_title_class as class_title, tbl_class.c_start_date as start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date as end_date, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS title_category, tbl_category.id AS id_category, tbl_sub_category.id AS id_sub_category, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS title_sub_category, tbl_evaluation.id AS id, tbl_student.last_name as last_name, tbl_student.first_name as first_name FROM tbl_evaluation INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation.f_class_id = tbl_class.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_id = tbl_class_student.id INNER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id WHERE tbl_evaluation.c_description IS NOT NULL AND tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id = '188'

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT tbl_evaluation.c_description as des, tbl_class.c_code as class_code, tbl_class.c_title_class as class_title, tbl_class.c_start_date as start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date as end_date, tbl_personnel.first_name, tbl_personnel.last_name, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS title_category, tbl_category.id AS id_category, tbl_sub_category.id AS id_sub_category, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS title_sub_category, tbl_evaluation.id AS id FROM tbl_evaluation INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation.f_class_id = tbl_class.id INNER JOIN tbl_personnel ON tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_id = tbl_personnel.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id WHERE tbl_evaluation.c_description IS NOT NULL AND tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id = '454'

changeSet.author: zare
changeSet.createView:
SELECT tclass.ID as id, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by , tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.C_SCORING_METHOD as tclass_scoring_method, tclass.PRE_COURSE_TEST as tclass_has_pre_test, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_WORKFLOW_ENDING_STATUS as tclass_ending_status, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TEACHER as teacher_eval_status, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TRAINING as training_eval_status, tclass.C_EVALUATION as C_EVALUATION, tclass.C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL as C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL, tclass.START_EVALUATION as START_EVALUATION, tclass.F_CANCEL_CLASS_REASON as CANCEL_REASON_ID, tclass.C_POSTPONE_START_DATE as POSTPONE_DATE, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.complex_id, personalInfo.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_First_Name, personalInfo.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_Last_Name, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE,1,4) as tclass_year, course.ID as course_id, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, institute.C_TITLE_FA as tclass_institute, altClasses.C_CODE as ALTERNATIVE_CLASS_CODE, CASE WHEN altClasses.ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS RE_HOLIDING_STATUS, CASE WHEN tclass.START_EVALUATION IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE( tclass.C_END_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd', 'nls_calendar=persian' )+30*tclass.START_EVALUATION END AS Behavioral_Due_Date, tclass.STUDENT_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_student_online_eval_status, tclass.TEACHER_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_teacher_online_eval_status
FROM TBL_CLASS tclass LEFT JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE institute ON institute.id = tclass.F_INSTITUTE LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS altClasses ON altClasses.id = tclass.F_ALTERNATIVE_CLASS LEFT JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.F_TEACHER LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personalInfo ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personalInfo.Id

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView:
SELECT tclass.ID as id, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by , tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.C_SCORING_METHOD as tclass_scoring_method, tclass.PRE_COURSE_TEST as tclass_has_pre_test, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_WORKFLOW_ENDING_STATUS as tclass_ending_status, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TEACHER as teacher_eval_status, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TRAINING as training_eval_status, tclass.C_EVALUATION as C_EVALUATION, tclass.C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL as C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL, tclass.START_EVALUATION as START_EVALUATION, tclass.F_CANCEL_CLASS_REASON as CANCEL_REASON_ID, tclass.C_POSTPONE_START_DATE as POSTPONE_DATE, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.complex_id, personalInfo.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_First_Name, personalInfo.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_Last_Name, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE,1,4) as tclass_year, course.ID as course_id, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, institute.C_TITLE_FA as tclass_institute, altClasses.C_CODE as ALTERNATIVE_CLASS_CODE, CASE WHEN altClasses.ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS RE_HOLIDING_STATUS, CASE WHEN tclass.START_EVALUATION IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE( tclass.C_END_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd', 'nls_calendar=persian' )+30*tclass.START_EVALUATION END AS Behavioral_Due_Date, tclass.STUDENT_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_student_online_eval_status, tclass.TEACHER_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_teacher_online_eval_status
FROM TBL_CLASS tclass LEFT JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE institute ON institute.id = tclass.F_INSTITUTE LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS altClasses ON altClasses.id = tclass.F_ALTERNATIVE_CLASS LEFT JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.F_TEACHER LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personalInfo ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personalInfo.Id

changeSet.createView: SELECT mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_id AS id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number AS emp_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number_10 AS personnel_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_address AS address, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_national_code AS national_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted AS deleted, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birth_city AS birth_place, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birthdate AS birth_date, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_moavenat_title AS ccp_assistant, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_hoze_title AS ccp_area, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_code AS ccp_code, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ccp_section, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_title AS ccp_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type AS p_type, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id AS f_department_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id AS f_geo_id, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_username AS c_username, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_code AS post_grade_code, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_title AS post_grade_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_date AS employment_date, mdms_tbl_md_employment_type.c_title AS employment_type_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_work_place_title AS work_place_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_edu_lvl_title AS education_level_title, mdms_tbl_md_job.c_title AS job_title, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type = 'ContractorPersonal' THEN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_title ELSE ' ' END AS company_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_email as email FROM mdms_tbl_md_employee LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_people ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_people_id = mdms_tbl_md_people.c_id INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_post_id = mdms_tbl_md_post.c_id INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_department ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id = mdms_tbl_md_department.c_id INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post_grade ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_grade_id = mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_employment_type ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_type_code = mdms_tbl_md_employment_type.c_code INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_job ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_job_code = mdms_tbl_md_job.c_code INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id = mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_id WHERE mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView:
SELECT tclass.ID as id, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by , tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.C_SCORING_METHOD as tclass_scoring_method, tclass.PRE_COURSE_TEST as tclass_has_pre_test, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_WORKFLOW_ENDING_STATUS as tclass_ending_status, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TEACHER as teacher_eval_status, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TRAINING as training_eval_status, tclass.C_EVALUATION as C_EVALUATION, tclass.C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL as C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL, tclass.START_EVALUATION as START_EVALUATION, tclass.F_CANCEL_CLASS_REASON as CANCEL_REASON_ID, tclass.C_POSTPONE_START_DATE as POSTPONE_DATE, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.complex_id, personalInfo.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_First_Name, personalInfo.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_Last_Name, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE,1,4) as tclass_year, course.ID as course_id, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, teachingmethod.c_title as teaching_method_title, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, institute.C_TITLE_FA as tclass_institute, altClasses.C_CODE as ALTERNATIVE_CLASS_CODE, CASE WHEN altClasses.ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS RE_HOLIDING_STATUS, CASE WHEN tclass.START_EVALUATION IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE( tclass.C_END_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd', 'nls_calendar=persian' )+30*tclass.START_EVALUATION END AS Behavioral_Due_Date, tclass.STUDENT_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_student_online_eval_status, tclass.TEACHER_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_teacher_online_eval_status
FROM TBL_CLASS tclass LEFT JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE institute ON institute.id = tclass.F_INSTITUTE LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS altClasses ON altClasses.id = tclass.F_ALTERNATIVE_CLASS LEFT JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.F_TEACHER LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personalInfo ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personalInfo.Id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value teachingmethod ON teachingmethod.id = tclass.f_teaching_method_id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT
rowNum as id,
na.course_code, na.course_title_fa, na.personnel_personnel_no, na.personnel_cpp_affairs, na.personnel_cpp_area, na.personnel_cpp_assistant, na.personnel_cpp_section, na.personnel_cpp_title, na.personnel_cpp_unit, na.personnel_company_name, na.personnel_complex_title, na.personnel_education_level_title, na.personnel_first_name, na.personnel_last_name, na.personnel_national_code, na.personnel_emp_no, na.personnel_post_code, na.personnel_post_title, CASE WHEN passed.class_student_scores_state_id IN ( 400, 401 ) THEN 216 ELSE 399 END AS is_passed FROM view_personnel_course_na_report na LEFT JOIN view_student_classstudent_class_term_course passed ON na.personnel_national_code = passed.student_national_code AND na.course_id = passed.course_id AND passed.class_student_scores_state_id IN ( 400, 401 ) ORDER BY na.personnel_national_code)

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT csession.c_session_date AS session_session_date, class.id AS class_id, std.id AS student_id, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1','2' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24,1) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1','2' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_minute, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3','4' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24,1) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3','4' ) THEN round(to_number(TO_DATE(csession.c_session_end_hour,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(csession.c_session_start_hour,'HH24:MI') ) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_minute, class.c_code AS class_code, class.c_status AS class_status, class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, class.c_teaching_type AS class_c_teaching_type, class.c_reason AS class_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id AS class_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id AS class_holding_class_type_id, substr(class.c_start_date,1,4) AS class_year, class.f_planner AS tclass_planner, class.f_supervisor AS tclass_supervisor, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, course.e_technical_type AS course_e_technical_type, class.n_h_duration AS course_duration, teachingmethod.c_title AS teaching_method_title, CASE WHEN course.e_theo_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 3 THEN '_' ELSE NULL END AS course_theo_type, category.id AS coursecategory, subcategory.id AS coursesubcategory, std.emp_no AS student_emp_no, std.personnel_no AS student_personnel_no, std.national_code AS student_national_code, std.first_name AS student_first_name, std.last_name AS student_last_name, department.c_moavenat_title AS student_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS student_ccp_affairs, department.c_ghesmat_title AS student_ccp_section, department.c_vahed_title AS student_ccp_unit, class_std.applicant_company_name AS class_student_applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title AS personnel_complex_title, personnel.work_place_title AS student_work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa AS student_post_grade_title, tbl_job.c_title_fa AS student_job_title, personal.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_firstname, personal.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_lastname, teacher.b_personnel AS course_teacher_status, teacher.id AS course_teacher_id, institute.id AS institute_id, institute.c_title_fa AS institute_c_title_fa, term.id AS term_id, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN tbl_student std ON att.f_student = std.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT view_active_personnel.personnel_no, view_active_personnel.national_code, view_active_personnel.complex_title, view_active_personnel.work_place_title, view_active_personnel.post_grade_title, view_active_personnel.f_post_id, view_active_personnel.f_department_id FROM view_active_personnel UNION ALL SELECT tbl_personnel_registered.personnel_no, tbl_personnel_registered.national_code, tbl_personnel_registered.complex_title, tbl_personnel_registered.work_place_title, tbl_personnel_registered.post_grade_title, tbl_personnel_registered.f_post_id, tbl_personnel_registered.f_department_id FROM tbl_personnel_registered ) personnel ON std.national_code = personnel.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = personnel.f_department_id INNER JOIN tbl_session csession ON att.f_session = csession.id INNER JOIN tbl_class class ON csession.f_class_id = class.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute institute ON class.f_institute_organizer = institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON class.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_term term ON class.f_term = term.id INNER JOIN tbl_category category ON course.category_id = category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category subcategory ON course.subcategory_id = subcategory.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON class.f_teacher = teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personal ON teacher.f_personality = personal.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student class_std ON class_std.student_id = std.id AND class_std.class_id = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON personnel.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_job ON tbl_job.id = tbl_post.f_job_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade ON tbl_post_grade.id = tbl_post.f_post_grade_id LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value teachingmethod ON teachingmethod.id = class.f_teaching_method_id GROUP BY class.id, class.c_start_date, class.c_end_date, csession.c_session_date, std.id, std.emp_no, std.personnel_no, std.national_code, std.first_name, std.last_name, class_std.applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title, personnel.work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa, tbl_job.c_title_fa, department.c_moavenat_title, department.c_omor_title, department.c_ghesmat_title, department.c_vahed_title, class.c_code, course.id, course.c_code, course.c_title_fa, course.e_technical_type, class.c_teaching_type, class.c_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id, class.c_status, institute.c_title_fa, institute.id, course.category_id, course.e_run_type, course.e_theo_type, course.e_level_type, category.id, subcategory.id, teacher.id, teacher.b_personnel, personal.c_first_name_fa, personal.c_last_name_fa, term.c_title_fa, term.id, class.f_planner, class.f_supervisor, class.n_h_duration, teachingmethod.c_title, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_id AS id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number AS emp_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number_10 AS personnel_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_address AS address, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_national_code AS national_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted AS deleted, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birth_city AS birth_place, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birthdate AS birth_date, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_father_name AS father_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_first_name AS first_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_last_name AS last_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_ssn AS birth_certificate_no, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_mobile AS phone, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_title AS post_title, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code AS post_code, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'MALE' THEN '' WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'FEMALE' THEN '' END AS gender_title, tbl_post.id AS f_post_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_code AS department_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_title AS department_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_area_of_study AS education_field_title, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_omor_title AS ccp_affairs, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_moavenat_title AS ccp_assistant, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_hoze_title AS ccp_area, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_code AS ccp_code, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ccp_section, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_title AS ccp_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type AS p_type, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id AS f_department_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id AS f_geo_id, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_username AS c_username, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_code AS post_grade_code, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_title AS post_grade_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_date AS employment_date, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_work_place_title AS work_place_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_edu_lvl_title AS education_level_title, mdms_tbl_md_job.c_title AS job_title, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type = 'ContractorPersonal' THEN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_title ELSE ' ' END AS company_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_email AS email, mdms_tbl_md_employee_status.c_title AS employment_status_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id as employment_status_id FROM mdms_tbl_md_employee LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_people ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_people_id = mdms_tbl_md_people.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_post_id = mdms_tbl_md_post.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_department ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id = mdms_tbl_md_department.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post_grade ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_grade_id = mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_job ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_job_code = mdms_tbl_md_job.c_code LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id = mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code = tbl_post.c_code AND tbl_post.e_deleted IS NULL INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_employee_status ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id = mdms_tbl_md_employee_status. c_id WHERE mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_id AS id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number AS emp_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number_10 AS personnel_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_address AS address, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_national_code AS national_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted AS deleted, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birth_city AS birth_place, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birthdate AS birth_date, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_father_name AS father_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_first_name AS first_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_last_name AS last_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_ssn AS birth_certificate_no, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_mobile AS phone, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_title AS post_title, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code AS post_code, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'MALE' THEN '' WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'FEMALE' THEN '' END AS gender_title, tbl_post.id AS f_post_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_code AS department_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_title AS department_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_area_of_study AS education_field_title, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_omor_title AS ccp_affairs, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_moavenat_title AS ccp_assistant, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_hoze_title AS ccp_area, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_code AS ccp_code, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ccp_section, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_title AS ccp_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type AS p_type, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id AS f_department_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id AS f_geo_id, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_username AS c_username, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_code AS post_grade_code, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_title AS post_grade_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_date AS employment_date, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_work_place_title AS work_place_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_edu_lvl_title AS education_level_title, mdms_tbl_md_job.c_title AS job_title, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type = 'ContractorPersonal' THEN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_title ELSE ' ' END AS company_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_email AS email, mdms_tbl_md_employee_status.c_title AS employment_status_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id as employment_status_id, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_mojtame_title as complex_title FROM mdms_tbl_md_employee LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_people ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_people_id = mdms_tbl_md_people.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_post_id = mdms_tbl_md_post.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_department ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id = mdms_tbl_md_department.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post_grade ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_grade_id = mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_job ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_job_code = mdms_tbl_md_job.c_code LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id = mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code = tbl_post.c_code AND tbl_post.e_deleted IS NULL INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_employee_status ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id = mdms_tbl_md_employee_status. c_id WHERE mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ROWNUM as id,n.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT f.class_code, f.class_status, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.course_code, f.course_titlefa, f.sub_category_titlefa, f.category_titlefa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.complex, f.is_personnel, f.teacher_national_code, f.teacher, f.final_teacher, f.reactione_evaluation_grade, f.teacher_grade_to_class, f.training_grade_to_teacher, f.javab_dade, f.total_std, f.miangin_javab_dade FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS id, z.class_code AS class_code, CASE WHEN z.status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, z.class_start_date AS class_start_date, z.class_end_date AS class_end_date, z.course_code AS course_code, z.course_titlefa AS course_titlefa, z.category_titlefa AS category_titlefa, z.sub_category_titlefa AS sub_category_titlefa, z.class_id AS class_id, z.course_id AS course_id, z.class_complex AS complex, z.is_personnel AS is_personnel, z.teacher_national_code AS teacher_national_code, z.teacher AS teacher, concat(concat(tbl_student.first_name, ' '), tbl_student.last_name) AS student, tbl_student.emp_no AS student_emp_number, tbl_student.personnel_no AS student_per_number, tbl_department.c_hoze_title AS student_hoze, tbl_department.c_omor_title AS student_omor, tbl_post.c_code AS student_post_code, tbl_post.c_title_fa AS student_post_title, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_teacher_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS final_teacher, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_reaction_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS reactione_evaluation_grade, modares.miangin AS teacher_grade_to_class, mianginmasol.miangin AS training_grade_to_teacher, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, CASE WHEN darsadjavab.javabdade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE darsadjavab.javabdade END AS javab_dade, CAST(( CASE WHEN darsadjavab.javabdade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE darsadjavab.javabdade END / clsstu.total_std) * 100 AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin_javab_dade FROM ( SELECT class_id, student_id, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tclass.id AS class_id, tclass.c_code AS class_code, tclass.c_status AS status, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, course.id AS course_id, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_name, tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_family, tbl_personal_info.c_national_code AS teacher_national_code, view_complex.c_title AS class_complex, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN ' ' END AS is_personnel FROM tbl_class tclass INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON tclass.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = course.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = course.subcategory_id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tclass.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tclass.complex_id = view_complex.id WHERE tclass.c_status != '1'
) z ON clsstu.class_id = z.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON clsstu.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_student.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis ON clsstu.class_id = tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation f ON z.class_id = f.f_class_id AND f.f_evaluator_type_id = '187' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CAST(SUM(rate * w) / SUM(w) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin, idmodares FROM ( SELECT tbl_questionnaire_question.f_weight AS w, tbl_parameter_value.c_value AS rate, tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_id AS idmodares FROM tbl_evaluation_answer INNER JOIN tbl_questionnaire_question ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_question_id = tbl_questionnaire_question. id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_answer_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) GROUP BY idmodares ) modares ON f.id = modares.idmodares LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation masol ON z.class_id = masol.f_class_id AND masol.f_evaluator_type_id = '454' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CAST(SUM(rate * w) / SUM(w) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin, idmodares FROM ( SELECT tbl_questionnaire_question.f_weight AS w, tbl_parameter_value.c_value AS rate, tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_id AS idmodares FROM tbl_evaluation_answer INNER JOIN tbl_questionnaire_question ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_question_id = tbl_questionnaire_question. id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_answer_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) GROUP BY idmodares ) mianginmasol ON masol.id = mianginmasol.idmodares LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_evaluation.f_class_id AS classid FROM tbl_evaluation WHERE tbl_evaluation.b_status = 1 AND tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id = 188 GROUP BY tbl_evaluation.f_class_id, tbl_evaluation.b_status, tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id ) darsadjavab ON z.class_id = darsadjavab.classid ORDER BY class_code ) f )n

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT "ID","POST","C_CODE","C_TITLE_FA","C_MOJTAME_TITLE","C_ASSISTANCE","C_AFFAIRS","C_SECTION","C_UNIT","NAME","UPDATETIME","N_VERSION" FROM( SELECT tp.id, '' AS post, tp.c_code, tp.c_title_fa, tbl_department.c_mojtame_title , tp.c_assistance, tp.c_affairs, tp.c_section, tp.c_unit, tp.d_last_modified_date_na AS updatetime, nvl2(p.last_name, p.first_name || p.last_name, tp.c_modified_by_na) AS name, tp.n_version
FROM tbl_training_post tp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_personnel WHERE tbl_personnel.deleted = 0 ) p ON tp.c_modified_by_na = p.c_username LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tp.f_department_id = tbl_department.id WHERE tp.c_modified_by_na IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL SELECT tp.id, ' ' AS post, tp.c_code, tp.c_title_fa, tbl_department.c_mojtame_title , tp.c_assistance, tp.c_affairs, tp.c_section, tp.c_unit, tp.d_last_modified_date_na AS updatetime, nvl2(p.last_name, p.first_name || p.last_name, tp.c_modified_by_na) AS name, tp.n_version FROM tbl_post tp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_personnel WHERE tbl_personnel.deleted = 0 ) p ON tp.c_modified_by_na = p.c_username LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tp.f_department_id = tbl_department.id WHERE tp.c_modified_by_na IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY name

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT tr_post.id, tr_post.c_created_by, tr_post.d_created_date, tr_post.e_deleted, tr_post.e_enabled, tr_post.c_last_modified_by, tr_post.d_last_modified_date, tr_post.n_version, tr_post.c_code, tr_post.c_title_fa, tr_post.c_affairs, tr_post.c_area, tr_post.c_assistance, tr_post.c_cost_center_title_fa, tr_post.c_cost_center_code, tr_post.c_section, tr_post.c_unit, tr_post.f_department_id, tr_post.f_post_grade_id, tr_post.f_job_id, tr_post.d_last_modified_date_na, tr_post.c_modified_by_na, tr_post.c_people_type, j.c_title_fa AS job_c_title_fa, j.c_code AS job_c_code, pg.c_title_fa AS post_grade_c_title_fa, pg.c_code AS post_grade_c_code, nvl(na.n_competence_count, 0) AS n_competence_count, nvl(prs_count.n_personnel_count, 0) AS n_personnel_count, tbl_department.c_mojtame_title FROM tbl_training_post tr_post LEFT JOIN tbl_job j ON j.id = tr_post.f_job_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade pg ON pg.id = tr_post.f_post_grade_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f_training_post_id, COUNT(*) AS n_personnel_count FROM ( SELECT post.id AS post_id, prs.id AS prs_id, ptp.f_training_post_id AS f_training_post_id FROM tbl_post_training_post ptp INNER JOIN tbl_post post ON post.id = ptp.f_post_id INNER JOIN tbl_personnel prs ON post.id = prs.f_post_id AND prs.deleted = 0 ) GROUP BY f_training_post_id ) prs_count ON prs_count.f_training_post_id = tr_post.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f_object AS tr_post_id, COUNT(DISTINCT f_competence) AS n_competence_count FROM ( SELECT tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type, tbl_needs_assessment.f_object, tbl_needs_assessment.f_competence FROM tbl_needs_assessment WHERE tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type = 'TrainingPost' AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_enabled IS NULL AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_deleted IS NULL ) GROUP BY f_object ) na ON na.tr_post_id = tr_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tr_post.f_department_id = tbl_department.id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ROWNUM as id , tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date as class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date as class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_teacher.b_personnel, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat( tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, clsstu.total_std as total_std, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_pretest, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_asli,
round((((nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std ) - (pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std ))/ (maxnahaii.maxasli - minpre.minpre)) * 100,2) as nerkh , tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade as learning, round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) AS max_nahaii, round(minpre.minpre, 2) AS min_pre, CASE WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) != 0 AND round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) IS NOT NULL THEN round(((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) / round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2)) - 1) * 100, 2) WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) = 0 THEN round((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2)), 2) END AS pishraft,
round(javabdadeAsli.javabdade/clsstu.total_std, 2)*100 AS darsad_javab_dade_asli , round(javabdadePre.javabdade/clsstu.total_std, 2)*100 AS darsad_javab_dade_pre , round(ghaboolAsli.javabdade/clsstu.total_std, 2)*100 AS darsad_ghabol ,
round(noghaboolAsli.javabdade/clsstu.total_std, 2)*100 AS darsad_noghabol
FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score is not null GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id
) javabdadeAsli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeAsli.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score is not null GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id
) javabdadePre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadePre.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE
(tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 or tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id
) ghaboolAsli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolAsli.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE
(tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id
) noghaboolAsli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolAsli.classid

changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, cl.c_code AS class_code, cl.c_status AS class_status, cl.c_start_date AS class_start_date, cl.c_end_date AS class_end_date, co.c_code AS course_code, co.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, sucat.ID AS sub_category_ID, cs.status_reaction AS class_student_status_reaction, ea.c_reaction_grade AS evaluation_analysis_reaction_grade, ea.b_reaction_pass AS evaluation_analysis_reaction_pass, ea.c_teacher_grade AS evaluation_analysis_teacher_grade, ea.b_teacher_pass AS evaluation_analysis_teacher_pass FROM tbl_class cl INNER JOIN tbl_course co ON cl.f_course = co.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = co.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = co.subcategory_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id AS class_id, SUM( CASE WHEN tbl_class_student.evaluation_status_reaction = 2 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) AS status_reaction FROM tbl_class_student GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) cs ON cl.id = cs.class_id INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis ea ON cl.id = ea.f_tclass

n."SUB_CATEGORY_ID", n."CATEGORY_TITLEFA", n."CLASS_ID", n."COURSE_ID", n."COMPLEX", n."IS_PERSONNEL", n."TEACHER_NATIONAL_CODE", n."TEACHER", n."FINAL_TEACHER", n."REACTIONE_EVALUATION_GRADE", n."TEACHER_GRADE_TO_CLASS", n."TRAINING_GRADE_TO_TEACHER", n."JAVAB_DADE", n."TOTAL_STD", n."MIANGIN_JAVAB_DADE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT f.class_code, f.class_status, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.course_code, f.course_titlefa, f.sub_category_titlefa, f.SUB_CATEGORY_ID, f.category_titlefa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.complex, f.is_personnel, f.teacher_national_code, student_post_title, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_teacher_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS final_teacher, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_reaction_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS reactione_evaluation_grade, modares.miangin AS teacher_grade_to_class, mianginmasol.miangin AS training_grade_to_teacher, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, CASE WHEN darsadjavab.javabdade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE darsadjavab.javabdade class_end_date, course.id AS course_id, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, sucat.ID AS
