* w) / SUM(w) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin, idmodares FROM ( SELECT tbl_questionnaire_question.f_weight AS w, tbl_parameter_value.c_value AS rate, tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_id AS idmodares FROM tbl_evaluation_answer INNER JOIN tbl_questionnaire_question ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_question_id = tbl_questionnaire_question. id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_answer_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) GROUP BY idmodares ) modares ON f.id = modares.idmodares LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation masol ON z.class_id = masol.f_class_id AND masol.f_evaluator_type_id = '454' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CAST(SUM(rate * w) / SUM(w) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin, idmodares FROM ( SELECT tbl_questionnaire_question.f_weight AS w, tbl_parameter_value.c_value AS rate, tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_id AS idmodares FROM tbl_evaluation_answer INNER JOIN tbl_questionnaire_question ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_question_id = tbl_questionnaire_question. id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_answer_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) GROUP BY idmodares ) mianginmasol ON masol.id = mianginmasol.idmodares LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_evaluation.f_class_id AS classid FROM tbl_evaluation WHERE tbl_evaluation.b_status = 1 AND tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id = 188 GROUP BY tbl_evaluation.f_class_id, tbl_evaluation.b_status, tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id ) darsadjavab ON z.class_id = darsadjavab.classid ORDER BY class_code ) f ) n

changeSet.author: xaniar (generated)
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tbl_class.c_acceptance_limit, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_class.c_code, tbl_class.c_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date, tbl_class.c_title_class, tbl_class.c_student_cost, CASE WHEN tbl_class.f_student_cost_currency = 619 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.f_student_cost_currency IS NULL THEN Null ELSE '' END AS f_student_cost_currency, tbl_course.c_code AS c_code1, tbl_course.c_title_fa, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher_fullname, tbl_personal_info.c_national_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, view_assistant.c_title AS moavenat, view_affairs.c_title AS omor, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN ' ' END AS is_personnel , classStu.total_std , (classStu.total_std * tbl_class.c_student_cost) as hazine
FROM tbl_class INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN view_assistant ON tbl_class.assistant_id = view_assistant.id LEFT JOIN view_affairs ON tbl_class.affairs_id = view_affairs.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id , tbl_class_student.student_id , COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student )
) classStu ON tbl_class.id = classStu.class_id ORDER BY tbl_class.id DESC

changeSet.author: nick (generated)
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ROWNUM as id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date as class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date as class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_teacher.b_personnel, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.ID AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std as total_std, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_pretest, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_asli,
round((((nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std) - (pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std)) / (maxnahaii.maxasli - minpre.minpre)) * 100, 2) as nerkh, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade as learning, round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) AS max_nahaii, round(minpre.minpre, 2) AS min_pre, CASE WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) != 0 AND round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) IS NOT NULL THEN round(((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) / round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2)) - 1) * 100, 2) WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) = 0 THEN round((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2)), 2) END AS pishraft,
round(javabdadeAsli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_asli, round(javabdadePre.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_pre, round(ghaboolAsli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_ghabol,
round(noghaboolAsli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_noghabol
FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score is not null GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeAsli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeAsli.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score is not null GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadePre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadePre.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE (tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 or tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolAsli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolAsli.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE (tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolAsli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolAsli.classid

CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.ID AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std as total_std, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade as learning, tbl_class.id AS idd FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE (tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400) OR (tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid ) doreha ON tbl_class_student.class_id = doreha.idd LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_student.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id ORDER BY doreha.class_code

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT tclass.ID as id, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by , tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.STUDENT_ONLINE_EVAL_EXECUTION_STATUS as STUDENT_ONLINE_EVAL_EXECUTION_STATUS, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.C_SCORING_METHOD as tclass_scoring_method, tclass.PRE_COURSE_TEST as tclass_has_pre_test, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_WORKFLOW_ENDING_STATUS as tclass_ending_status, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TEACHER as teacher_eval_status, tclass.EVALUATION_REACTION_TRAINING as training_eval_status, tclass.C_EVALUATION as C_EVALUATION, tclass.C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL as C_BEHAVIORAL_LEVEL, tclass.START_EVALUATION as START_EVALUATION, tclass.F_CANCEL_CLASS_REASON as CANCEL_REASON_ID, tclass.C_POSTPONE_START_DATE as POSTPONE_DATE, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.complex_id, personalInfo.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_First_Name, personalInfo.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_Last_Name, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE,1,4) as tclass_year, course.ID as course_id, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, teachingmethod.c_title as teaching_method_title, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, institute.C_TITLE_FA as tclass_institute, altClasses.C_CODE as ALTERNATIVE_CLASS_CODE, CASE WHEN altClasses.ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS RE_HOLIDING_STATUS, CASE WHEN tclass.START_EVALUATION IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE( tclass.C_END_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd', 'nls_calendar=persian' )+30*tclass.START_EVALUATION END AS Behavioral_Due_Date, tclass.STUDENT_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_student_online_eval_status, tclass.TEACHER_ONLINE_EVAL_STATUS as tclass_teacher_online_eval_status
FROM TBL_CLASS tclass LEFT JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE institute ON institute.id = tclass.F_INSTITUTE LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS altClasses ON altClasses.id = tclass.F_ALTERNATIVE_CLASS LEFT JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.F_TEACHER LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personalInfo ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personalInfo.Id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value teachingmethod ON teachingmethod.id = tclass.f_teaching_method_id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_id AS id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number AS emp_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number_10 AS personnel_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_address AS address, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_national_code AS national_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted AS deleted, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birth_city AS birth_place, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birthdate AS birth_date, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_father_name AS father_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_first_name AS first_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_last_name AS last_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_ssn AS birth_certificate_no, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_mobile AS phone, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_title AS post_title, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code AS post_code, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'MALE' THEN '' WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'FEMALE' THEN '' END AS gender_title, tbl_post.id AS f_post_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_code AS department_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_title AS department_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_area_of_study AS education_field_title, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_omor_title AS ccp_affairs, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_moavenat_title AS ccp_assistant, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_hoze_title AS ccp_area, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_code AS ccp_code, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ccp_section, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_title AS ccp_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type AS p_type, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id AS f_department_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id AS f_geo_id, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_username AS c_username, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_code AS post_grade_code, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_title AS post_grade_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_date AS employment_date, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_work_place_title AS work_place_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_edu_lvl_title AS education_level_title, mdms_tbl_md_job.c_title AS job_title, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type = 'ContractorPersonal' THEN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_title ELSE ' ' END AS company_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_email AS email, mdms_tbl_md_employee_status.c_title AS employment_status_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id as employment_status_id, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_mojtame_title as complex_title FROM mdms_tbl_md_employee LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_people ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_people_id = mdms_tbl_md_people.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_post_id = mdms_tbl_md_post.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_department ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id = mdms_tbl_md_department.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post_grade ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_grade_id = mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_job ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_job_code = mdms_tbl_md_job.c_code LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id = mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code = tbl_post.c_code AND tbl_post.e_deleted IS NULL INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_employee_status ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id = mdms_tbl_md_employee_status. c_id WHERE mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, n."CLASS_ID", n."CLASS_CODE", n."CLASS_START_DATE", n."CLASS_END_DATE", n."TOTAL_STD", n."COURSE_ID", n."COURSE_CODE", n."COURSE_TITLE_FA", n."CLASS_YEAR", n."TERM_ID", n."CATEGORY_ID", n."CATEGORY_TITLE_FA", n."SUB_CATEGORY_ID", n."SUB_CATEGORY_TITLE_FA", n."TEACHER_ID", n."TEACHER_NATIONAL_CODE", n."TEACHER_FULL_NAME", n."STD_COMPLEX", n."STD_ASSISTANT", n."STD_AFFAIRS" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT f.class_code, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.total_std, f.course_code, f.course_title_fa, f.class_year, f.term_id, f.sub_category_title_fa, f.sub_category_id, f.category_id, f.category_title_fa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.teacher_id, f.teacher_national_code, f.teacher_full_name, LISTAGG(f.student_complex, ' -- ' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY f.student_complex ) AS std_complex, LISTAGG(f.student_assistant, ' -- ' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY f.student_assistant ) AS std_assistant, LISTAGG(f.student_affairs, ' -- ' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY f.student_affairs ) AS std_affairs FROM ( SELECT z.class_code AS class_code, z.class_start_date AS class_start_date, z.class_end_date AS class_end_date, z.course_code AS course_code, z.course_titlefa AS course_title_fa, substr( z.class_start_date, 1, 4 ) AS class_year, z.term_id AS term_id, z.category_id AS category_id, z.category_titlefa AS category_title_fa, z.sub_category_titlefa AS sub_category_title_fa, z.sub_category_id AS sub_category_id, z.class_id AS class_id, z.course_id AS course_id, z.teacher_id AS teacher_id, z.teacher_national_code AS teacher_national_code, z.teacher_full_name AS teacher_full_name, concat( concat( tbl_student.first_name, ' ' ), tbl_student.last_name ) AS student, tbl_student.personnel_no AS student_per_number, tbl_department.c_mojtame_title AS student_complex, tbl_department.c_moavenat_title AS student_assistant, tbl_department.c_omor_title AS student_affairs, clsstu.total_std AS total_std FROM ( SELECT class_id, student_id, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tclass.id AS class_id, tclass.c_code AS class_code, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, course.id AS course_id, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, term.id AS term_id, cat.id AS category_id, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, sucat.id AS sub_category_id, teacher.id AS teacher_id, concat( concat( tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' ' ), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa ) AS teacher_full_name, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_name, tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_family, tbl_personal_info.c_national_code AS teacher_national_code FROM tbl_class tclass INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON tclass.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_term term ON tclass.f_term = term.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = course.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = course.subcategory_id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON tclass.f_teacher = teacher.id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info ON teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id WHERE tclass.c_status != '1' ) z ON clsstu.class_id = z.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON clsstu.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id ORDER BY class_code ) f GROUP BY f.class_code, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.total_std, f.course_code, f.course_title_fa, f.class_year, f.term_id, f.sub_category_title_fa, f.sub_category_id, f.category_id, f.category_title_fa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.teacher_id, f.teacher_national_code, f.teacher_full_name ) n

changeSet.author: namdari (generated)
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ROWNUM as id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date as class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date as class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_teacher.b_personnel, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.ID AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std as total_std, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_pretest, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_asli,
round((((nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std) - (pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std)) / nullif(maxnahaii.maxasli - minpre.minpre , 0)) * 100, 2) as nerkh, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade as learning, round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) AS max_nahaii, round(minpre.minpre, 2) AS min_pre, CASE WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) != 0 AND round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) IS NOT NULL THEN round(((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) / round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2)) - 1) * 100, 2) WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) = 0 THEN round((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2)), 2) END AS pishraft,
round(javabdadeAsli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_asli, round(javabdadePre.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_pre, round(ghaboolAsli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_ghabol,
round(noghaboolAsli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_noghabol
FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score is not null GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeAsli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeAsli.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score is not null GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadePre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadePre.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE (tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 or tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolAsli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolAsli.classid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid
FROM tbl_class_student WHERE (tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolAsli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolAsli.classid

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT case when classStu.national_code IS NOT NULL THEN 1 else 0 end as is_student, case when na.national_code IS NOT NULL THEN 1 else 0 end as has_na,
must_pass.course_id, na.national_code, must_pass.course_code, must_pass.course_title_fa, must_pass.category_id, must_pass.personnel_personnel_no, must_pass.personnel_first_name, must_pass.personnel_last_name, must_pass.personnel_national_code, department.c_omor_title AS personnel_ccp_affairs, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_ccp_area, department.c_moavenat_title AS personnel_ccp_assistant, department.c_code AS personnel_cpp_code, department.c_ghesmat_title AS personnel_ccp_section, department.c_title AS personnel_cpp_title, department.c_vahed_title AS personnel_ccp_unit, must_pass.personnel_company_name, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_complex_title, must_pass.personnel_education_level_title, must_pass.personnel_id, must_pass.personnel_job_no, must_pass.personnel_job_title, must_pass.personnel_emp_no, post.c_code AS personnel_post_code, postgrade.c_code AS personnel_post_grade_code, post.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_title, passed.class_student_id AS class_student_id, postgrade.id AS personnel_post_grade_id, postgrade.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_grade_title FROM view_sub_active_personnel_must_pass_course must_pass LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = must_pass.personnel_f_department_id LEFT JOIN view_sub_active_personnel_passed_course passed ON passed.f_course = must_pass.course_id AND passed.national_code = must_pass.personnel_national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_post post ON must_pass.personnel_f_post_id = post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade postgrade ON post.f_post_grade_id = postgrade.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tbl_student.national_code
FROM tbl_class_student INNER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id) classStu ON must_pass.personnel_national_code=classStu.national_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT
view_personnel_course_na_report.course_id as course_id, view_personnel_course_na_report.personnel_national_code as national_code FROM view_personnel_course_na_report ) na ON (must_pass.personnel_national_code=na.national_code and must_pass.course_id=na.course_id)
WHERE passed.class_student_id IS NULL AND must_pass.employment_status_id IN ( 160, 210, 370, 380 )

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT co.id AS course_id, co.c_code AS course_code, co.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, co.e_theo_type AS course_theo_type, co.category_id AS category_id, p.personnel_no AS personnel_personnel_no, p.first_name AS personnel_first_name, p.last_name AS personnel_last_name, p.national_code AS personnel_national_code, p.ccp_affairs AS personnel_cpp_affairs, p.ccp_area AS personnel_cpp_area, p.ccp_assistant AS personnel_cpp_assistant, p.ccp_code AS personnel_cpp_code, p.ccp_section AS personnel_cpp_section, p.ccp_title AS personnel_cpp_title, p.ccp_unit AS personnel_cpp_unit, p.company_name AS personnel_company_name, p.complex_title AS personnel_complex_title, p.education_level_title AS personnel_education_level_title, p.id AS personnel_id, p.job_no AS personnel_job_no, p.job_title AS personnel_job_title, p.emp_no AS personnel_emp_no, p.post_code AS personnel_post_code, p.post_grade_code AS personnel_post_grade_code, p.post_grade_title AS personnel_post_grade_title, p.post_title AS personnel_post_title, p.f_department_id AS personnel_f_department_id, p.f_post_id AS personnel_f_post_id, p.employment_status_id AS employment_status_id FROM tbl_course co CROSS JOIN view_active_personnel p

changeSet.author: MShahabi
changeSet.createView: SELECT CASE WHEN classstu.national_code IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_student, CASE WHEN na.national_code IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS has_na, must_pass.course_id, na.national_code, must_pass.course_code, must_pass.course_title_fa, CASE WHEN must_pass.course_theo_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN must_pass.course_theo_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN must_pass.course_theo_type = 3 THEN '_' ELSE NULL END AS course_theo_type, must_pass.category_id, must_pass.personnel_personnel_no, must_pass.personnel_first_name, must_pass.personnel_last_name, must_pass.personnel_national_code, department.c_omor_title AS personnel_ccp_affairs, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_ccp_area, department.c_moavenat_title AS personnel_ccp_assistant, department.c_code AS personnel_cpp_code, department.c_ghesmat_title AS personnel_ccp_section, department.c_title AS personnel_cpp_title, department.c_vahed_title AS personnel_ccp_unit, must_pass.personnel_company_name, department.c_hoze_title AS personnel_complex_title, must_pass.personnel_education_level_title, must_pass.personnel_id, must_pass.personnel_job_no, must_pass.personnel_job_title, must_pass.personnel_emp_no, post.c_code AS personnel_post_code, postgrade.c_code AS personnel_post_grade_code, post.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_title, passed.class_student_id AS class_student_id, postgrade.id AS personnel_post_grade_id, postgrade.c_title_fa AS personnel_post_grade_title FROM view_sub_active_personnel_must_pass_course must_pass LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = must_pass.personnel_f_department_id LEFT JOIN view_sub_active_personnel_passed_course passed ON passed.f_course = must_pass.course_id AND passed.national_code = must_pass.personnel_national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_post post ON must_pass.personnel_f_post_id = post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade postgrade ON post.f_post_grade_id = postgrade.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT tbl_student.national_code FROM tbl_class_student INNER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id ) classstu ON must_pass.personnel_national_code = classstu.national_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT view_personnel_course_na_report.course_id AS course_id, view_personnel_course_na_report.personnel_national_code AS national_code FROM view_personnel_course_na_report ) na ON ( must_pass.personnel_national_code = na.national_code AND must_pass.course_id = na.course_id ) WHERE passed.class_student_id IS NULL AND must_pass.employment_status_id IN ( 160, 210, 370, 380 )

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, n.class_id, n.class_code, n.class_start_date, n.class_end_date, n.total_std, n.course_id, n.course_code, n.course_title_fa, n.class_year, n.term_id, n.category_id, n.category_title_fa, n.sub_category_id, n.sub_category_title_fa, n.teacher_id, n.teacher_national_code, n.teacher_full_name, n.std_complex, n.std_assistant, n.std_affairs, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_behavioral_grade, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_reaction_grade, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_results_grade, tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass, pre.mianginpre as miangin_pre FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT f.class_code, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.total_std, f.course_code, f.course_title_fa, f.class_year, f.term_id, f.sub_category_title_fa, f.sub_category_id, f.category_id, f.category_title_fa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.teacher_id, f.teacher_national_code, f.teacher_full_name, LISTAGG(f.student_complex, ' -- ' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY f.student_complex ) AS std_complex, LISTAGG(f.student_assistant, ' -- ' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY f.student_assistant ) AS std_assistant, LISTAGG(f.student_affairs, ' -- ' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY f.student_affairs ) AS std_affairs FROM ( SELECT z.class_code AS class_code, z.class_start_date AS class_start_date, z.class_end_date AS class_end_date, z.course_code AS course_code, z.course_titlefa AS course_title_fa, substr(z.class_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, z.term_id AS term_id, z.category_id AS category_id, z.category_titlefa AS category_title_fa, z.sub_category_titlefa AS sub_category_title_fa, z.sub_category_id AS sub_category_id, z.class_id AS class_id, z.course_id AS course_id, z.teacher_id AS teacher_id, z.teacher_national_code AS teacher_national_code, z.teacher_full_name AS teacher_full_name, concat(concat(tbl_student.first_name, ' '), tbl_student.last_name) AS student, tbl_student.personnel_no AS student_per_number, tbl_department.c_mojtame_title AS student_complex, tbl_department.c_moavenat_title AS student_assistant, tbl_department.c_omor_title AS student_affairs, clsstu.total_std AS total_std FROM ( SELECT class_id, student_id, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tclass.id AS class_id, tclass.c_code AS class_code, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, course.id AS course_id, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, term.id AS term_id, cat.id AS category_id, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, sucat.id AS sub_category_id, teacher.id AS teacher_id, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher_full_name, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_name, tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_family, tbl_personal_info.c_national_code AS teacher_national_code FROM tbl_class tclass INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON tclass.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_term term ON tclass.f_term = term.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = course.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = course.subcategory_id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON tclass.f_teacher = teacher.id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info ON teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id WHERE tclass.c_status != '1' ) z ON clsstu.class_id = z.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON clsstu.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id ORDER BY class_code ) f GROUP BY f.class_code, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.total_std, f.course_code, f.course_title_fa, f.class_year, f.term_id, f.sub_category_title_fa, f.sub_category_id, f.category_id, f.category_title_fa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.teacher_id, f.teacher_national_code, f.teacher_full_name ) n LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis ON n.class_id = tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON n.class_id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON n.class_id = pre.classid

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT pg.id, pg.c_created_by, pg.e_deleted, pg.d_created_date, pg.e_enabled, pg.c_last_modified_by, pg.d_last_modified_date, pg.c_code, pg.n_version, pg.c_title_fa, pg.d_last_modified_date_na, pg.c_modified_by_na, pg.c_people_type, COUNT(DISTINCT na.f_competence) AS n_competence_count, COUNT(DISTINCT prs.id) AS n_personnel_count, pg.c_title_fa_2 FROM tbl_post_grade pg LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_needs_assessment WHERE tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type = 'PostGrade' AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_deleted IS NULL AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_enabled IS NULL ) na ON pg.id = na.f_object LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_training_post WHERE tbl_training_post.e_deleted IS NULL ) tp ON tp.f_post_grade_id = pg.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_training_post ptp ON tp.id = ptp.f_training_post_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_post WHERE tbl_post.e_deleted IS NULL ) p ON p.id = ptp.f_post_id LEFT JOIN view_active_personnel prs ON p.id = prs.f_post_id GROUP BY pg.id, pg.c_created_by, pg.e_deleted, pg.d_created_date, pg.e_enabled, pg.c_last_modified_by, pg.d_last_modified_date, pg.c_code, pg.n_version, pg.c_title_fa, pg.d_last_modified_date_na, pg.c_modified_by_na, pg.c_people_type, pg.c_title_fa_2

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_id AS id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number AS emp_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_em_number_10 AS personnel_no, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_address AS address, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_national_code AS national_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted AS deleted, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birth_city AS birth_place, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_birthdate AS birth_date, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_father_name AS father_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_first_name AS first_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_last_name AS last_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_ssn AS birth_certificate_no, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_mobile AS phone, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_title AS post_title, mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code AS post_code, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'MALE' THEN '' WHEN mdms_tbl_md_people.c_gender = 'FEMALE' THEN '' END AS gender_title, tbl_post.id AS f_post_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_code AS department_code, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_inc_dep_title AS department_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_area_of_study AS education_field_title, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_omor_title AS ccp_affairs, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_moavenat_title AS ccp_assistant, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_hoze_title AS ccp_area, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_code AS ccp_code, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ccp_section, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_title AS ccp_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type AS p_type, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id AS f_department_id, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id AS f_geo_id, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_username AS c_username, mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_code AS post_grade_code, RTRIM(regexp_replace(mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_title, '[0-9]', '')) AS post_grade_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_date AS employment_date, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_work_place_title AS work_place_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_edu_lvl_title AS education_level_title, mdms_tbl_md_job.c_title AS job_title, CASE WHEN mdms_tbl_md_employee.p_type = 'ContractorPersonal' THEN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_title ELSE ' ' END AS company_name, mdms_tbl_md_people.c_email AS email, mdms_tbl_md_employee_status.c_title AS employment_status_title, mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id as employment_status_id, mdms_tbl_md_department.c_mojtame_title as complex_title FROM mdms_tbl_md_employee LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_people ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_people_id = mdms_tbl_md_people.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_post_id = mdms_tbl_md_post.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_department ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_dep_id = mdms_tbl_md_department.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_post_grade ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_grade_id = mdms_tbl_md_post_grade.c_id LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_job ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_job_code = mdms_tbl_md_job.c_code LEFT JOIN mdms_tbl_md_geo_work ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_geo_id = mdms_tbl_md_geo_work.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON mdms_tbl_md_post.c_code = tbl_post.c_code AND tbl_post.e_deleted IS NULL INNER JOIN mdms_tbl_md_employee_status ON mdms_tbl_md_employee.c_emp_status_id = mdms_tbl_md_employee_status. c_id WHERE mdms_tbl_md_employee.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT tr_post.id, tr_post.c_created_by, tr_post.d_created_date, tr_post.e_deleted, tr_post.e_enabled, tr_post.c_last_modified_by, tr_post.d_last_modified_date, tr_post.n_version, tr_post.c_code, tr_post.c_title_fa, tr_post.c_affairs, tr_post.c_area, tr_post.c_assistance, tr_post.c_cost_center_title_fa, tr_post.c_cost_center_code, tr_post.c_section, tr_post.c_unit, tr_post.f_department_id, tr_post.f_post_grade_id, tr_post.f_job_id, tr_post.d_last_modified_date_na, tr_post.c_modified_by_na, tr_post.c_people_type, j.c_title_fa AS job_c_title_fa, j.c_code AS job_c_code, pg.c_title_fa AS post_grade_c_title_fa, pg.c_code AS post_grade_c_code, nvl(na.n_competence_count, 0) AS n_competence_count, nvl(prs_count.n_personnel_count, 0) AS n_personnel_count, tbl_department.c_mojtame_title, tbl_committee_of_experts.title as committee , case when tbl_committee_of_experts.title IS NOT NULL THEN 1 else 0 end as has_committee
FROM tbl_training_post tr_post LEFT JOIN tbl_job j ON j.id = tr_post.f_job_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade pg ON pg.id = tr_post.f_post_grade_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f_training_post_id, COUNT(*) AS n_personnel_count FROM ( SELECT post.id AS post_id, prs.id AS prs_id, ptp.f_training_post_id AS f_training_post_id FROM tbl_post_training_post ptp INNER JOIN tbl_post post ON post.id = ptp.f_post_id INNER JOIN tbl_personnel prs ON post.id = prs.f_post_id AND prs.deleted = 0 ) GROUP BY f_training_post_id ) prs_count ON prs_count.f_training_post_id = tr_post.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f_object AS tr_post_id, COUNT(DISTINCT f_competence) AS n_competence_count FROM ( SELECT tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type, tbl_needs_assessment.f_object, tbl_needs_assessment.f_competence FROM tbl_needs_assessment WHERE tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type = 'TrainingPost' AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_enabled IS NULL AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_deleted IS NULL ) GROUP BY f_object ) na ON na.tr_post_id = tr_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tr_post.f_department_id = tbl_department.id LEFT JOIN tbl_committee_of_experts_post ON tr_post.id = tbl_committee_of_experts_post.object_id LEFT JOIN tbl_committee_of_experts ON tbl_committee_of_experts_post.f_committee_id = tbl_committee_of_experts. id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT p.id, p.c_created_by, p.d_created_date, p.e_deleted, p.e_enabled, p.c_last_modified_by, p.d_last_modified_date, p.n_version, p.c_code, p.c_title_fa, p.c_affairs, p.c_area, p.c_mojtame_title, p.c_assistance, p.c_cost_center_title_fa, p.c_cost_center_code, p.c_section, p.c_unit, p.f_post_grade_id, p.f_job_id, p.d_last_modified_date_na, p.c_modified_by_na, p.c_people_type, j.c_title_fa AS job_c_title_fa, j.c_code AS job_c_code, pg.c_title_fa AS post_grade_c_title_fa, pg.c_code AS post_grade_c_code, COUNT(DISTINCT na.f_competence) AS n_competence_count, COUNT(DISTINCT prs.id) AS n_personnel_count, tbl_committee_of_experts.title as committee , case when tbl_committee_of_experts.title IS NOT NULL THEN 1 else 0 end as has_committee
FROM tbl_post p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_needs_assessment WHERE tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type = 'Post' AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_deleted IS NULL AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_enabled IS NULL ) na ON p.id = na.f_object LEFT JOIN view_active_personnel prs ON p.id = prs.f_post_id INNER JOIN tbl_job j ON j.id = p.f_job_id INNER JOIN tbl_post_grade pg ON pg.id = p.f_post_grade_id left JOIN tbl_committee_of_experts_post ON p.id = tbl_committee_of_experts_post.object_id left JOIN tbl_committee_of_experts ON tbl_committee_of_experts_post.f_committee_id = tbl_committee_of_experts. id GROUP BY p.id, p.c_created_by, p.d_created_date, p.e_deleted, p.e_enabled, p.c_last_modified_by, p.d_last_modified_date, p.n_version, p.c_code, p.c_title_fa, p.c_affairs, p.c_area, p.c_mojtame_title, p.c_assistance, p.c_cost_center_title_fa, p.c_cost_center_code, p.c_section, p.c_unit, p.f_post_grade_id, p.f_job_id, p.d_last_modified_date_na, p.c_modified_by_na, p.c_people_type, j.c_title_fa, j.c_code, pg.c_title_fa, pg.c_code, tbl_committee_of_experts.title

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT pg.id, pg.c_created_by, pg.d_created_date, pg.e_deleted, pg.e_enabled, pg.c_last_modified_by, pg.d_last_modified_date, pg.n_version, pg.c_description, pg.c_title_fa, pg.c_title_en, pg.c_code, pg.d_last_modified_date_na, pg.c_modified_by_na, COUNT(DISTINCT na.f_competence) AS n_competence_count, COUNT(DISTINCT prs.id) AS n_personnel_count, tbl_committee_of_experts.title as committee , case when tbl_committee_of_experts.title IS NOT NULL THEN 1 else 0 end as has_committee FROM tbl_post_group pg LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_needs_assessment WHERE tbl_needs_assessment.c_object_type = 'PostGroup' AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_deleted IS NULL AND tbl_needs_assessment.e_enabled IS NULL ) na ON pg.id = na.f_object LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM view_all_posts WHERE view_all_posts.e_deleted IS NULL ) p ON p.groupid = pg.id LEFT JOIN view_active_personnel prs ON p.postid = prs.f_post_id LEFT JOIN tbl_committee_of_experts_post ON pg.id = tbl_committee_of_experts_post.object_id LEFT JOIN tbl_committee_of_experts ON tbl_committee_of_experts_post.f_committee_id = tbl_committee_of_experts. id GROUP BY pg.id, pg.c_created_by, pg.d_created_date, pg.e_deleted, pg.e_enabled, pg.c_last_modified_by, pg.d_last_modified_date, pg.n_version, pg.c_description, pg.c_title_fa, pg.c_title_en, pg.c_code, pg.d_last_modified_date_na, pg.c_modified_by_na, tbl_committee_of_experts.title

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, doreha.*, concat(concat(tbl_student.first_name, ' '), tbl_student.last_name) AS student, tbl_student.national_code AS student_national_code, tbl_student.emp_no, tbl_student.personnel_no, tbl_post.c_code AS student_post_code, tbl_post.c_title_fa AS student_post_title, tbl_department.c_hoze_title AS student_hoze, tbl_department.c_omor_title AS student_omor, tbl_class_student.score * 5 AS nore_nahaii, tbl_class_student.pre_test_score * 5 AS nore_pish, tbl_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ghesmat, tbl_department.c_moavenat_title AS moavenat, tbl_department.c_vahed_title AS vahed, tbl_term.id AS term_id FROM tbl_class_student INNER JOIN ( SELECT tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.id AS category_id, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.id AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade AS learning, tbl_class.id AS idd, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_term.c_code AS term_code, tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS teaching_method, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS institute, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 ) OR ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class.f_teaching_method_id = tbl_parameter_value.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_class.f_institute_organizer = tbl_institute.id ) doreha ON tbl_class_student.class_id = doreha.idd LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_student.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id, tbl_term ORDER BY doreha.class_code

AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.id AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade AS learning, tbl_class.id AS idd, tbl_category.id, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, tbl_class.f_term, tbl_term.c_title_fa, tbl_term.c_code, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS c_title_fa1, tbl_parameter_value.c_title FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 ) OR ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_class.f_institute = tbl_institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class.f_teaching_method_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) doreha ON tbl_class_student.class_id = doreha.idd LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_student.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id ORDER BY doreha.class_code

changeSet.author: Namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_teacher.b_personnel, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.id AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_pretest, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_asli, round((((nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std) -(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std)) / nullif(maxnahaii.maxasli - minpre.minpre, 0)) * 100, 2) AS nerkh, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade AS learning, round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) AS max_nahaii, round(minpre.minpre, 2) AS min_pre, CASE WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) != 0 AND round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) IS NOT NULL THEN round(((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) / round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2)) - 1) * 100, 2) WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) = 0 THEN round((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2)), 2) END AS pishraft, round(javabdadeasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_asli, round(javabdadepre.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_pre, round(ghaboolasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_ghabol, round(noghaboolasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_noghabol, tbl_category.id AS category_id, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, view_assistant.c_title AS moavenat, view_affairs.c_title AS omor, tbl_term.id AS term_id , tbl_term.c_code as term_code, tbl_institute.c_title_fa as institute, tbl_parameter_value.c_title as teaching_method FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 ) OR ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN view_assistant ON tbl_class.assistant_id = view_assistant.id LEFT JOIN view_affairs ON tbl_class.affairs_id = view_affairs.id INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_class.f_institute = tbl_institute.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class.f_teaching_method_id = tbl_parameter_value.id

changeSet.author: kasehpour
changeSet.createView: SELECT rowNum as id, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_FirstName, personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_LastName, CONCAT(CONCAT(personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA, ' '), personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA) as teacher_FullName, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.f_cancel_class_reason as class_cancel_reason_id, parameterValue.C_TITLE as class_cancel_reason_title, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by, tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.ID as tclass_id, evaluationanalysis.ID as evaluationanalysis_id, unit.ID as unit_id, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.C_EVALUATION as tclass_evaluation, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.f_holding_class_type_id as holding_class_type_id, holdingClassTypParameterValue.C_TITLE as holding_class_type_title, tclass.f_teaching_method_id as teaching_method_id, teachingMethodParameterValue.C_TITLE as teaching_method_title, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE, 1, 4) as tclass_year, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.E_TECHNICAL_TYPE as course_technical_type, course.E_RUN_TYPE as course_run_type, course.E_THEO_TYPE as course_theo_type, course.E_LEVEL_TYPE as course_level_type, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, plnner_dep.C_MOJTAME_TITLE as planner_complex, plnner_dep.C_MOAVENAT_TITLE as planner_assistant, plnner_dep.C_OMOR_TITLE as planner_affairs, plnner_dep.C_GHESMAT_TITLE as planner_section, plnner_dep.C_VAHED_TITLE as planner_unit, CONCAT(CONCAT(personelPlanner.FIRST_NAME, ' '), personelPlanner.LAST_NAME) as planner_name, organizer_ins.C_TITLE_FA as institute_name, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_BEHAVIORAL_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_EFFECTIVENESS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_LEARNING_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_REACTION_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_RESULTS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_TEACHER_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, STATISTICS_.PRESENCE, STATISTICS_.ABSENCE, STATISTICS_.UNKNOWN, supervisor.FIRST_NAME || supervisor.LAST_NAME as supervisor FROM TBL_CLASS tclass INNER JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TARGET_SOCIETY unit ON unit.F_CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_EVALUATION_ANALYSIS evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.F_TCLASS = tclass.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON tclass.F_TEACHER = teacher.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personal ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personal.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_personnel personelPlanner on personelPlanner.id = tclass.f_planner LEFT JOIN tbl_department plnner_dep on plnner_dep.id = personelPlanner.f_department_id LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE organizer_ins on tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER = organizer_ins.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE parameterValue on tclass.f_cancel_class_reason = parameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE holdingClassTypParameterValue on tclass.f_holding_class_type_id = holdingClassTypParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE teachingMethodParameterValue on tclass.f_teaching_method_id = teachingMethodParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_personnel supervisor on supervisor.id = tclass.F_SUPERVISOR LEFT JOIN( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT att_state, f_class_id, s_hour FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (att.c_state = 1 OR att.c_state = 2) THEN 'PRESENCE' WHEN (att.c_state = 3 OR att.c_state = 4) THEN 'ABSENCE' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS att_state, att.f_session, att.f_student, sess.f_class_id, sess.s_hour FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN ( SELECT (to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number (regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 1, 1)) - (to_number(regexp_substr (c_session_start_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_start_hour , '[^:]+', 1, 1)))) / 60 AS s_hour, id, f_class_id FROM tbl_session ) sess ON (att.f_session = sess.id) ) ) PIVOT ( SUM(s_hour) FOR att_state IN ( 'PRESENCE' AS presence, 'ABSENCE' AS absence, 'UNKNOWN' AS unknown ) ) ) STATISTICS_ on (tclass.id = STATISTICS_.f_class_id)

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, res.* FROM ( SELECT tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN '' END AS effectiveness_type, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN ' ' END AS effectiveness_status, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS effectiveness_grade, tbl_term.id AS term_id, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tbl_class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_student.id AS student_id, CASE WHEN tbl_student.first_name IS NULL AND tbl_student.last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name END AS student_full_name, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_class.c_title_class AS class_title, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa || ' ' || tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_full_name, tbl_category.id AS course_category_id, tbl_student.ccp_affairs AS student_affair, tbl_student.ccp_area AS student_complex, tbl_student.ccp_assistant AS student_assistant, tbl_class.c_evaluation AS class_evaluation_code, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 2 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 3 THEN '' END AS evaluation_type FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id ) res

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, res.* FROM ( SELECT tclass.c_code AS class_code, course.c_code AS course_code, tclass.c_title_class AS class_title, teacher.id AS teacher_id, CASE WHEN personalinfo.c_first_name_fa = personalinfo.c_last_name_fa THEN personalinfo.c_last_name_fa WHEN personalinfo.c_first_name_fa IS NULL AND personalinfo.c_last_name_fa IS NOT NULL THEN personalinfo.c_last_name_fa WHEN personalinfo.c_last_name_fa IS NULL AND personalinfo.c_first_name_fa IS NOT NULL THEN personalinfo.c_first_name_fa ELSE personalinfo.c_first_name_fa || ' ' || personalinfo.c_last_name_fa END AS teacher_full_name, CASE WHEN tclass.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tclass.c_scoring_method AS class_scoring_method_code, CASE WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 1 THEN '' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN ' 100' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN ' 20' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 4 THEN ' ' END AS class_scoring_method_title, CASE WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method IN ( 1, 4 ) THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method IN ( 2, 3 ) THEN ' ' END AS class_scoring_status, CAST((( SELECT COUNT(*) AS t FROM tbl_class_student cs LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value pv ON cs.scores_state_id = pv.id WHERE pv.c_code IN( 'PassdByGrade', 'PassedWithoutGrade' ) AND cs.class_id = tbl_class_student.class_id ) / nullif(( SELECT COUNT(*) AS k FROM tbl_class_student cs WHERE cs.class_id = tbl_class_student.class_id ), 0)) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS acceptance_percentage, course.category_id AS category_id, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tclass.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_student.id AS student_id, CASE WHEN tbl_student.first_name IS NULL AND tbl_student.last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name END AS student_full_name, view_complex.id AS complex_id, view_complex.c_title AS complex_title, view_affairs.id AS affair_id, view_affairs.c_title AS affair_title, view_assistant.id AS assistant_id, view_assistant.c_title AS assistant_title, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS institute_title FROM tbl_class tclass LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class_student.class_id = tclass.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON tclass.f_course = course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.f_teacher LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personalinfo ON teacher.f_personality = personalinfo.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tclass.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tclass.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN view_affairs ON tclass.affairs_id = view_affairs.id LEFT JOIN view_assistant ON tclass.assistant_id = view_assistant.id LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tclass.f_institute = tbl_institute.id)res

changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tclass.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tclass.c_title_class AS class_title, teacher.id AS teacher_id, CASE WHEN personalinfo.c_first_name_fa = personalinfo.c_last_name_fa THEN personalinfo.c_last_name_fa WHEN personalinfo.c_first_name_fa IS NULL AND personalinfo.c_last_name_fa IS NOT NULL THEN personalinfo.c_last_name_fa WHEN personalinfo.c_last_name_fa IS NULL AND personalinfo.c_first_name_fa IS NOT NULL THEN personalinfo.c_first_name_fa ELSE personalinfo.c_first_name_fa || ' ' || personalinfo.c_last_name_fa END AS teacher_full_name, tbl_student.national_code AS student_national_code, tbl_student.id AS student_id, tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name AS student_full_name, tbl_student.ccp_area AS student_complex, tbl_student.ccp_assistant AS student_assistant, tbl_student.ccp_affairs AS student_affair, tclass.c_scoring_method AS class_scoring_method_code, CASE WHEN tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 401 THEN ' 100' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN ' 20' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 4 THEN ' ' END AS class_scoring_method_title, tbl_class_student.score AS student_score, tclass.c_acceptance_limit AS acceptance_limit, tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS acceptance_status, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tclass.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS institute_title, tbl_course.category_id AS course_category_id, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_title FROM tbl_class tclass LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class_student.class_id = tclass.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.f_teacher LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personalinfo ON teacher.f_personality = personalinfo.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tclass.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tclass.f_institute = tbl_institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tclass.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = tbl_parameter_value.id

personalinfo.c_last_name_fa END AS teacher_full_name, CASE WHEN tclass.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tclass.c_scoring_method AS class_scoring_method_code, CASE WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 1 THEN '' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN ' 100' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN ' 20' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method = 4 THEN ' ' END AS class_scoring_method_title, CASE WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method IN ( 1, 4 ) THEN ' ' WHEN tclass.c_scoring_method IN ( 2, 3 ) THEN ' ' END AS class_scoring_status, CAST((( SELECT COUNT(*) AS t FROM tbl_class_student cs LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value pv ON cs.scores_state_id = pv.id WHERE pv.c_code IN( 'PassdByGrade', 'PassedWithoutGrade' ) AND cs.class_id = tbl_class_student.class_id ) / nullif(( SELECT COUNT(*) AS k FROM tbl_class_student cs WHERE cs.class_id = tbl_class_student.class_id ), 0)) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS acceptance_percentage, course.category_id AS category_id, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tclass.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_student.id AS student_id, CASE WHEN tbl_student.first_name IS NULL AND tbl_student.last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name END AS student_full_name, view_complex.id AS complex_id, view_complex.c_title AS complex_title, view_affairs.id AS affair_id, view_affairs.c_title AS affair_title, view_assistant.id AS assistant_id, view_assistant.c_title AS assistant_title, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS institute_title FROM tbl_class tclass LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class_student.class_id = tclass.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON tclass.f_course = course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON teacher.id = tclass.f_teacher LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personalinfo ON teacher.f_personality = personalinfo.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tclass.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tclass.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN view_affairs ON tclass.affairs_id = view_affairs.id LEFT JOIN view_assistant ON tclass.assistant_id = view_assistant.id LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tclass.f_institute = tbl_institute.id)res

changeSet.author: namdari
namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT rowNum as id, term.C_TITLE_FA as term_TitleFa, personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA as teacher_FirstName, personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA as teacher_LastName, CONCAT(CONCAT(personal.C_FIRST_NAME_FA, ' '), personal.C_LAST_NAME_FA) as teacher_FullName, tclass.N_H_DURATION as tclass_n_duration, tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER as tclass_organizer, tclass.C_STATUS as tclass_status, tclass.f_cancel_class_reason as class_cancel_reason_id, parameterValue.C_TITLE as class_cancel_reason_title, tclass.F_PLANNER as tclass_planner, tclass.F_SUPERVISOR as tclass_supervisor, tclass.c_created_by as c_created_by, tclass.d_created_date as d_created_date, tclass.e_deleted as e_deleted, tclass.e_enabled as e_enabled, tclass.c_last_modified_by as c_last_modified_by, tclass.d_last_modified_date as d_last_modified_date, tclass.n_version as n_version, tclass.ID as tclass_id, evaluationanalysis.ID as evaluationanalysis_id, unit.ID as unit_id, tclass.C_CODE as tclass_c_code, tclass.F_INSTITUTE as institute_id, tclass.F_TEACHER as teacher_id, tclass.F_TERM as term_id, tclass.C_START_DATE as tclass_c_start_date, tclass.C_END_DATE as tclass_c_end_date, tclass.C_REASON as tclass_reason, tclass.C_EVALUATION as tclass_evaluation, tclass.c_teaching_type as tclass_teaching_type, tclass.f_holding_class_type_id as holding_class_type_id, holdingClassTypParameterValue.C_TITLE as holding_class_type_title, tclass.f_teaching_method_id as teaching_method_id, teachingMethodParameterValue.C_TITLE as teaching_method_title, SUBSTR(tclass.C_START_DATE, 1, 4) as tclass_year, course.C_CODE as course_c_code, course.E_TECHNICAL_TYPE as course_technical_type, course.E_RUN_TYPE as course_run_type, course.E_THEO_TYPE as course_theo_type, course.E_LEVEL_TYPE as course_level_type, course.CATEGORY_ID as course_category_id, course.SUBCATEGORY_ID as course_subcategory_id, course.C_TITLE_FA as course_c_title_fa, course.C_EVALUATION as course_c_evaluation, plnner_dep.C_MOJTAME_TITLE as planner_complex, plnner_dep.C_MOAVENAT_TITLE as planner_assistant, plnner_dep.C_OMOR_TITLE as planner_affairs, plnner_dep.C_GHESMAT_TITLE as planner_section,
