plnner_dep.C_VAHED_TITLE as planner_unit, CONCAT(CONCAT(personelPlanner.FIRST_NAME, ' '), personelPlanner.LAST_NAME) as planner_name, organizer_ins.C_TITLE_FA as institute_name, CASE WHEN students.counts IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE students.counts END AS tclass_students_count, evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_BEHAVIORAL_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_EFFECTIVENESS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_LEARNING_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_REACTION_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_RESULTS_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.B_TEACHER_PASS as evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_REACTION_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_BEHAVIORAL_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_LEARNING_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_RESULTS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_TEACHER_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.C_EFFECTIVENESS_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, STATISTICS_.PRESENCE, STATISTICS_.ABSENCE, STATISTICS_.UNKNOWN, supervisor.FIRST_NAME || supervisor.LAST_NAME as supervisor , Reactionpercent.percent_reaction , behevioralpercent.percent_behavior
FROM TBL_CLASS tclass INNER JOIN TBL_COURSE course ON tclass.F_COURSE = course.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TARGET_SOCIETY unit ON unit.F_CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID, count(TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.ID) as counts FROM TBL_CLASS_STUDENT GROUP BY TBL_CLASS_STUDENT.CLASS_ID) students ON students.CLASS_ID = tclass.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_EVALUATION_ANALYSIS evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.F_TCLASS = tclass.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TERM term ON tclass.F_TERM = term.ID INNER JOIN TBL_TEACHER teacher ON tclass.F_TEACHER = teacher.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PERSONAL_INFO personal ON teacher.F_PERSONALITY = personal.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_personnel personelPlanner on personelPlanner.id = tclass.f_planner LEFT JOIN tbl_department plnner_dep on plnner_dep.id = personelPlanner.f_department_id LEFT JOIN TBL_INSTITUTE organizer_ins on tclass.F_INSTITUTE_ORGANIZER = organizer_ins.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE parameterValue on tclass.f_cancel_class_reason = parameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE holdingClassTypParameterValue on tclass.f_holding_class_type_id = holdingClassTypParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PARAMETER_VALUE teachingMethodParameterValue on tclass.f_teaching_method_id = teachingMethodParameterValue.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_personnel supervisor on supervisor.id = tclass.F_SUPERVISOR LEFT JOIN( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT att_state, f_class_id, s_hour FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (att.c_state = 1 OR att.c_state = 2) THEN 'PRESENCE' WHEN (att.c_state = 3 OR att.c_state = 4) THEN 'ABSENCE' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS att_state, att.f_session, att.f_student, sess.f_class_id, sess.s_hour FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN ( SELECT (to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number (regexp_substr(c_session_end_hour, '[^:]+', 1, 1)) - (to_number(regexp_substr (c_session_start_hour, '[^:]+', 3, 1)) + 60 * to_number(regexp_substr(c_session_start_hour , '[^:]+', 1, 1)))) / 60 AS s_hour, id, f_class_id FROM tbl_session ) sess ON (att.f_session = sess.id) ) ) PIVOT ( SUM(s_hour) FOR att_state IN ( 'PRESENCE' AS presence, 'ABSENCE' AS absence, 'UNKNOWN' AS unknown ) ) ) STATISTICS_ on (tclass.id = STATISTICS_.f_class_id) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS filled_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND (cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_reaction IS NULL ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id )
) Reactionpercent on tclass.id = Reactionpercent.class_id LEFT JOIN (
SELECT class_id AS class_id, -- filled_behavior_eval AS filled_behavior_eval, -- all_behavioral_eval AS all_behavioral_eval, CASE WHEN all_behavioral_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_behavior_eval / all_behavioral_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_behavior FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id-- 40615 AND cs.evaluation_status_behavior IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_behavior_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id--40615 AND cs.evaluation_status_behavior IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) ) AS all_behavioral_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id -- WHERE -- cs.class_id = 40615 ) ) behevioralpercent on tclass.id = behevioralpercent.class_id

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, res.* FROM ( SELECT tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN '' END AS effectiveness_type, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN ' ' END AS effectiveness_status, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS effectiveness_grade, tbl_term.id AS term_id, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tbl_class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_student.id AS student_id, CASE WHEN tbl_student.first_name IS NULL AND tbl_student.last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name END AS student_full_name, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_class.c_title_class AS class_title, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa || ' ' || tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_full_name, tbl_category.id AS course_category_id, tbl_student.ccp_affairs AS student_affair, tbl_student.ccp_area AS student_complex, tbl_student.ccp_assistant AS student_assistant, tbl_class.c_evaluation AS class_evaluation_code, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 2 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 3 THEN '' END AS evaluation_type, reactionpercent.percent_reaction AS answered_reaction_eval_percent, learningpercent.percent_learning AS answered_learning_eval_percent, behavioralpercent.percent_behavior AS answered_behavior_eval_percent FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS filled_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND (cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_reaction IS NULL ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) reactionpercent ON reactionpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_learning_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_learning_eval / all_learning_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_learning FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_learning IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_learning_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_learning IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_learning IS NULL ) ) AS all_learning_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) learningpercent ON learningpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_behavioral_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_behavior_eval / all_behavioral_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_behavior FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_behavior IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_behavior_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_behavior IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_behavior IS NULL ) ) AS all_behavioral_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) behavioralpercent ON behavioralpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id ) res

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, cl.c_code AS class_code, cl.c_status AS class_status, cl.c_start_date AS class_start_date, cl.c_end_date AS class_end_date, co.c_code AS course_code, co.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, sucat.id AS sub_category_id, cs.status_reaction AS class_student_status_reaction, CAST(ea.c_reaction_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluation_analysis_reaction_grade, ea.b_reaction_pass AS evaluation_analysis_reaction_pass, CAST(ea.c_teacher_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluation_analysis_teacher_grade, ea.b_teacher_pass AS evaluation_analysis_teacher_pass, reactionpercent.percent_reaction FROM tbl_class cl INNER JOIN tbl_course co ON cl.f_course = co.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = co.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = co.subcategory_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id AS class_id, SUM( CASE WHEN tbl_class_student.evaluation_status_reaction = 2 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) AS status_reaction FROM tbl_class_student GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) cs ON cl.id = cs.class_id INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis ea ON cl.id = ea.f_tclass LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS filled_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_reaction IS NULL ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) reactionpercent ON cl.id = reactionpercent.class_id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT tbl_class.id, tbl_class.c_code AS classcode, tbl_course.c_code AS coursecode, tbl_class.c_title_class AS onvanclass, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS nahvebargozari, tbl_class.c_student_cost || ' ' || tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS hazinehdore, tbl_class.c_start_date || ' ' || tbl_class.c_end_date AS tarikhbargozari, tbl_institute1.c_title_fa mahalbargozari, tbl_course.category_id, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS categorytitle, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS darkhastamouzeshi, tbl_class.n_h_duration || ' ' AS modatdore, tbl_class.c_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date, ' ' || tbl_class.n_group AS n_group, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_class.calendar_id FROM tbl_class LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_institute.id = tbl_class.f_institute_organizer INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_class.f_course LEFT JOIN tbl_institute tbl_institute1 ON tbl_institute1.id = tbl_class.f_institute LEFT JOIN tbl_class_training_place ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_training_place ON tbl_training_place.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_training_place_id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_category.id = tbl_course.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_parameter_value.id = tbl_class.f_student_cost_currency

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT view_calendar_educational_calendar.id, tbl_session.c_day_name, tbl_session.c_session_date, tbl_session.c_session_start_hour, tbl_session.c_session_end_hour, view_calendar_educational_calendar.calendar_id, view_calendar_educational_calendar.classcode FROM view_calendar_educational_calendar INNER JOIN tbl_session ON tbl_session.f_class_id = view_calendar_educational_calendar.id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT id, coursecode, noedore, nahvebargozari, hazinehdore, tarikhbargozari, mahalbargozari, categorytitle, darkhastamouzeshi, modatdore, ahdafasli, pishniaz, sarfaslha, calendar_id, c_code FROM ( SELECT tbl_class.id, tbl_course.c_code AS coursecode, ( CASE WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 5 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 6 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 7 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 8 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 9 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 10 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS noedore, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS nahvebargozari, tbl_class.c_student_cost || ' ' || tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS hazinehdore, tbl_class.c_start_date || ' ' || tbl_class.c_end_date AS tarikhbargozari, tbl_institute1.c_title_fa mahalbargozari, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS categorytitle, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS darkhastamouzeshi, tbl_class.n_h_duration || ' ' AS modatdore, tbl_skill.c_title_fa ahdafasli, tbl_course1.c_title_fa AS pishniaz, tbl_syllabus.c_title_fa AS sarfaslha, tbl_class.calendar_id, tbl_class.c_code FROM tbl_class LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_institute.id = tbl_class.f_institute_organizer INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_class.f_course LEFT JOIN tbl_institute tbl_institute1 ON tbl_institute1.id = tbl_class.f_institute LEFT JOIN tbl_class_training_place ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_training_place ON tbl_training_place.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_training_place_id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_category.id = tbl_course.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_parameter_value.id = tbl_class.f_student_cost_currency LEFT JOIN tbl_skill ON tbl_course.id = tbl_skill.f_main_objective_course LEFT JOIN tbl_pre_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_pre_course.f_course_id LEFT JOIN tbl_course tbl_course1 ON tbl_course1.id = tbl_pre_course.f_pre_course_id LEFT JOIN tbl_course_goal ON tbl_course_goal.f_course_id = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_syllabus ON tbl_syllabus.f_goal = tbl_course_goal.f_goal_id )

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT id, LISTAGG(sarfaslha, ';' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY sarfaslha ) AS sarfaslha, calendar_id,c_code FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.sarfaslha, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code
FROM view_calendar_detail ) GROUP BY id, calendar_id,c_code

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT id, LISTAGG(pishniaz, ';' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY pishniaz ) AS pishniaz, calendar_id,c_code FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.pishniaz, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code
FROM view_calendar_detail ) GROUP BY id, calendar_id,c_code

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT id, LISTAGG(ahdafasli, ';' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY ahdafasli ) AS ahdafasli, calendar_id,c_code FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.ahdafasli, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code FROM view_calendar_detail ) GROUP BY id, calendar_id,c_code

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.coursecode, view_calendar_detail.noedore, view_calendar_detail.nahvebargozari, view_calendar_detail.hazinehdore, view_calendar_detail.tarikhbargozari, view_calendar_detail.mahalbargozari, view_calendar_detail.categorytitle, view_calendar_detail.darkhastamouzeshi, view_calendar_detail.modatdore, view_calendar_of_main_goals.ahdafasli, view_calendar_prerequisite.pishniaz, view_calendar_headline.sarfaslha, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code FROM view_calendar_detail INNER JOIN view_calendar_of_main_goals ON view_calendar_of_main_goals.id = view_calendar_detail.id INNER JOIN view_calendar_prerequisite ON view_calendar_prerequisite.id = view_calendar_detail.id INNER JOIN view_calendar_headline ON view_calendar_headline.id = view_calendar_detail.id

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, n."CLASS_CODE", n."CLASS_STATUS", n."CLASS_END_DATE", n."CLASS_START_DATE", n."COURSE_CODE", n."COURSE_TITLEFA", n."SUB_CATEGORY_TITLEFA", n."SUB_CATEGORY_ID", n."CATEGORY_TITLEFA", n."CLASS_ID", n."COURSE_ID", n."COMPLEX", n."IS_PERSONNEL", n."TEACHER_NATIONAL_CODE", n."TEACHER", n."FINAL_TEACHER", n."REACTIONE_EVALUATION_GRADE", n."TEACHER_GRADE_TO_CLASS", n."TRAINING_GRADE_TO_TEACHER", n."JAVAB_DADE", n."TOTAL_STD", n."PERCENT_REACTION" --n."MIANGIN_JAVAB_DADE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT f.class_code, f.class_status, f.class_end_date, f.class_start_date, f.course_code, f.course_titlefa, f.sub_category_titlefa, f.sub_category_id, f.category_titlefa, f.class_id, f.course_id, f.complex, f.is_personnel, f.teacher_national_code, f.teacher, f.final_teacher, f.reactione_evaluation_grade, f.teacher_grade_to_class, f.training_grade_to_teacher, f.javab_dade, f.total_std, f.percent_reaction -- f.miangin_javab_dade FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS id, z.class_code AS class_code, CASE WHEN z.status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN z.status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, z.class_start_date AS class_start_date, z.class_end_date AS class_end_date, z.course_code AS course_code, z.course_titlefa AS course_titlefa, z.category_titlefa AS category_titlefa, z.sub_category_titlefa AS sub_category_titlefa, z.sub_category_id AS sub_category_id, z.class_id AS class_id, z.course_id AS course_id, z.class_complex AS complex, z.is_personnel AS is_personnel, z.teacher_national_code AS teacher_national_code, z.teacher AS teacher, concat(concat(tbl_student.first_name, ' '), tbl_student.last_name) AS student, tbl_student.emp_no AS student_emp_number, tbl_student.personnel_no AS student_per_number, tbl_department.c_hoze_title AS student_hoze, tbl_department.c_omor_title AS student_omor, tbl_post.c_code AS student_post_code, tbl_post.c_title_fa AS student_post_title, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_teacher_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS final_teacher, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_reaction_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS reactione_evaluation_grade, modares.miangin AS teacher_grade_to_class, mianginmasol.miangin AS training_grade_to_teacher, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, CASE WHEN darsadjavab.javabdade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE darsadjavab.javabdade END AS javab_dade, percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT class_id, student_id, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tclass.id AS class_id, tclass.c_code AS class_code, tclass.c_status AS status, tclass.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tclass.c_end_date AS class_end_date, course.id AS course_id, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, cat.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, sucat.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, sucat.id AS sub_category_id, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_name, tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_family, tbl_personal_info.c_national_code AS teacher_national_code, view_complex.c_title AS class_complex, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN ' ' END AS is_personnel FROM tbl_class tclass INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON tclass.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_category cat ON cat.id = course.category_id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category sucat ON sucat.id = course.subcategory_id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tclass.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tclass.complex_id = view_complex.id WHERE tclass.c_status != '1' ) z ON clsstu.class_id = z.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON clsstu.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_student.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis ON clsstu.class_id = tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation f ON z.class_id = f.f_class_id AND f.f_evaluator_type_id = '187' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CAST(SUM(rate * w) / SUM(w) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin, idmodares FROM ( SELECT tbl_questionnaire_question.f_weight AS w, tbl_parameter_value.c_value AS rate, tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_id AS idmodares FROM tbl_evaluation_answer INNER JOIN tbl_questionnaire_question ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_question_id = tbl_questionnaire_question .id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_answer_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) GROUP BY idmodares ) modares ON f.id = modares.idmodares LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation masol ON z.class_id = masol.f_class_id AND masol.f_evaluator_type_id = '454' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CAST(SUM(rate * w) / SUM(w) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS miangin, idmodares FROM ( SELECT tbl_questionnaire_question.f_weight AS w, tbl_parameter_value.c_value AS rate, tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_id AS idmodares FROM tbl_evaluation_answer INNER JOIN tbl_questionnaire_question ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_evaluation_question_id = tbl_questionnaire_question .id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_evaluation_answer.f_answer_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) GROUP BY idmodares ) mianginmasol ON masol.id = mianginmasol.idmodares LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_evaluation.f_class_id AS classid FROM tbl_evaluation WHERE tbl_evaluation.b_status = 1 AND tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id = 188 GROUP BY tbl_evaluation.f_class_id, tbl_evaluation.b_status, tbl_evaluation.f_evaluator_type_id ) darsadjavab ON z.class_id = darsadjavab.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS filled_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_reaction IS NULL ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) percent_ ON clsstu.class_id = percent_.class_id ORDER BY class_code ) f ) n

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, res.* FROM ( SELECT tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN '' END AS effectiveness_type, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN ' ' END AS effectiveness_status, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS effectiveness_grade, tbl_term.id AS term_id, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tbl_class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_student.id AS student_id, CASE WHEN tbl_student.first_name IS NULL AND tbl_student.last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name END AS student_full_name, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_class.c_title_class AS class_title, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa || ' ' || tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_full_name, tbl_category.id AS course_category_id, tbl_student.ccp_affairs AS student_affair, tbl_student.ccp_area AS student_complex, tbl_student.ccp_assistant AS student_assistant, tbl_class.c_evaluation AS class_evaluation_code, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 2 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 3 THEN '' END AS evaluation_type, reactionpercent.percent_reaction AS answered_reaction_eval_percent, learningpercent.percent_learning AS answered_learning_eval_percent, behavioralpercent.percent_behavior AS answered_behavior_eval_percent FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS filled_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_reaction IS NULL ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) reactionpercent ON reactionpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_learning_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_learning_eval / all_learning_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_learning FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_learning IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_learning_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_learning IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_learning IS NULL ) ) AS all_learning_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) learningpercent ON learningpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_behavioral_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_behavior_eval / all_behavioral_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_behavior FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT class.id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 AND ex.b_status = 1 ) AS filled_behavior_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 ) AS all_behavioral_eval FROM tbl_class class INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation e ON e.f_class_id = class.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari_id.id -- 156 ) ) behavioralpercent ON behavioralpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id ) res

changeSet.author: Montazeri
Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, doreha.class_code, doreha.complex, doreha.class_start_date, doreha.class_end_date, doreha.class_status, doreha.is_personnel, doreha.teacher, doreha.teacher_national_code, doreha.course_code, doreha.course_titlefa, doreha.category_titlefa, doreha.sub_category_titlefa, doreha.sub_category_id, doreha.total_std, doreha.learning, doreha.idd, concat(concat(tbl_student.first_name, ' '), tbl_student.last_name) AS student, tbl_student.national_code AS student_national_code, tbl_student.emp_no, tbl_student.personnel_no, tbl_post.c_code AS student_post_code, tbl_post.c_title_fa AS student_post_title, tbl_department.c_hoze_title AS student_hoze, tbl_department.c_omor_title AS student_omor, tbl_class_student.score * 5 AS nore_nahaii, tbl_class_student.pre_test_score * 5 AS nore_pish, doreha.id AS category_id, doreha.teacher_id, tbl_department.c_moavenat_title AS moavenat, tbl_department.c_vahed_title AS vahed, tbl_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ghesmat, doreha.f_term AS term_id, doreha.c_title_fa AS term_title, doreha.c_code AS term_code, doreha.c_title_fa1 AS institute, doreha.c_title AS teaching_method, pr.percent_reaction FROM tbl_class_student INNER JOIN ( SELECT tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.id AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade AS learning, tbl_class.id AS idd, tbl_category.id, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, tbl_class.f_term, tbl_term.c_title_fa, tbl_term.c_code, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS c_title_fa1, tbl_parameter_value.c_title FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 ) OR ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_class.f_institute = tbl_institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class.f_teaching_method_id = tbl_parameter_value.id ) doreha ON tbl_class_student.class_id = doreha.idd LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_student.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_department ON tbl_student.f_department_id = tbl_department.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) pr ON tbl_class_student.class_id = pr.class_id ORDER BY doreha.class_code

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_teacher.b_personnel, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.id AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_pretest, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 2 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_asli, round((((nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std) -(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std)) / nullif(maxnahaii.maxasli - minpre.minpre , 0)) * 100, 2) AS nerkh, tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade AS learning, round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) AS max_nahaii, round(minpre.minpre, 2) AS min_pre, CASE WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) != 0 AND round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) IS NOT NULL THEN round(((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) / round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2)) - 1) * 100, 2) WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) = 0 THEN round((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2)), 2) END AS pishraft, round(javabdadeasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_asli, round(javabdadepre.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_pre, round(ghaboolasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_ghabol, round(noghaboolasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_noghabol, tbl_category.id AS category_id, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, view_assistant.c_title AS moavenat, view_affairs.c_title AS omor, tbl_term.id AS term_id, tbl_term.c_code AS term_code, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS institute, tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS teaching_method, pr.percent_reaction FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 ) OR ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN view_assistant ON tbl_class.assistant_id = view_assistant.id LEFT JOIN view_affairs ON tbl_class.affairs_id = view_affairs.id INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_class.f_institute = tbl_institute.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class.f_teaching_method_id = tbl_parameter_value.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) pr ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = pr.class_id

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView: SELECT ROWNUM AS id, res.* FROM ( SELECT tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN '' END AS effectiveness_type, CASE WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 0 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_evaluation_analysis.b_effectiveness_pass = 1 THEN ' ' END AS effectiveness_status, CAST(tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS effectiveness_grade, tbl_term.id AS term_id, tbl_term.c_title_fa AS term_title, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, substr(tbl_class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, tbl_student.id AS student_id, CASE WHEN tbl_student.first_name IS NULL AND tbl_student.last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name END AS student_full_name, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_class.c_title_class AS class_title, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa || ' ' || tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_full_name, tbl_category.id AS course_category_id, tbl_student.ccp_affairs AS student_affair, tbl_student.ccp_area AS student_complex, tbl_student.ccp_assistant AS student_assistant, tbl_class.c_evaluation AS class_evaluation_code, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 2 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_evaluation = 3 THEN '' END AS evaluation_type, reactionpercent.percent_reaction AS answered_reaction_eval_percent, behavioralpercent.percent_behavior AS answered_behavior_eval_percent FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id LEFT JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS filled_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) --AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND ( cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) OR cs.evaluation_status_reaction IS NULL ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) reactionpercent ON reactionpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_behavioral_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_behavior_eval / all_behavioral_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_behavior FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT class.id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 AND ex.b_status = 1 ) AS filled_behavior_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 ) AS all_behavioral_eval FROM tbl_class class INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation e ON e.f_class_id = class.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari_id.id -- 156 ) ) behavioralpercent ON behavioralpercent.class_id = tbl_class.id ) res

changeSet.author: Montazeri
changeSet.createView:
SELECT DISTINCT csession.c_session_date AS session_session_date, class.id AS class_id, std.id AS student_id, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1', '2' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24, 1) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1', '2' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_minute, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3', '4' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24, 1) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3', '4' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_minute, class.c_code AS class_code, class.c_status AS class_status, class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, class.c_teaching_type AS class_c_teaching_type, class.c_reason AS class_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id AS class_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id AS class_holding_class_type_id, substr(class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, class.f_planner AS tclass_planner, class.f_supervisor AS tclass_supervisor, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, course.e_technical_type AS course_e_technical_type, class.n_h_duration AS course_duration, teachingmethod.c_title AS teaching_method_title, CASE WHEN course.e_theo_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 3 THEN '_' ELSE NULL END AS course_theo_type, category.id AS coursecategory, subcategory.id AS coursesubcategory, std.emp_no AS student_emp_no, std.personnel_no AS student_personnel_no, std.national_code AS student_national_code, std.first_name AS student_first_name, std.last_name AS student_last_name, department.c_moavenat_title AS student_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS student_ccp_affairs, department.c_ghesmat_title AS student_ccp_section, department.c_vahed_title AS student_ccp_unit, class_std.applicant_company_name AS class_student_applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title AS personnel_complex_title, personnel.work_place_title AS student_work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa AS student_post_grade_title, tbl_job.c_title_fa AS student_job_title, personal.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_firstname, personal.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_lastname, teacher.b_personnel AS course_teacher_status, teacher.id AS course_teacher_id, institute.id AS institute_id, institute.c_title_fa AS institute_c_title_fa, term.id AS term_id, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, CAST(evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, CAST(evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, CAST(evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status, pr.percent_reaction AS answered_reaction_eval_percent, pb.percent_behavior AS answered_behavioral_eval_percent FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN tbl_student std ON att.f_student = std.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT view_active_personnel.personnel_no, view_active_personnel.national_code, view_active_personnel.complex_title, view_active_personnel.work_place_title, view_active_personnel.post_grade_title, view_active_personnel.f_post_id, view_active_personnel.f_department_id FROM view_active_personnel UNION ALL SELECT tbl_personnel_registered.personnel_no, tbl_personnel_registered.national_code, tbl_personnel_registered.complex_title, tbl_personnel_registered.work_place_title, tbl_personnel_registered.post_grade_title, tbl_personnel_registered.f_post_id, tbl_personnel_registered.f_department_id FROM tbl_personnel_registered ) personnel ON std.national_code = personnel.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = personnel.f_department_id INNER JOIN tbl_session csession ON att.f_session = csession.id INNER JOIN tbl_class class ON csession.f_class_id = class.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute institute ON class.f_institute_organizer = institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON class.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_term term ON class.f_term = term.id INNER JOIN tbl_category category ON course.category_id = category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category subcategory ON course.subcategory_id = subcategory.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON class.f_teacher = teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personal ON teacher.f_personality = personal.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student class_std ON class_std.student_id = std.id AND class_std.class_id = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON personnel.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_job ON tbl_job.id = tbl_post.f_job_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade ON tbl_post_grade.id = tbl_post.f_post_grade_id LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value teachingmethod ON teachingmethod.id = class.f_teaching_method_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) pr ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = pr.class_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_behavioral_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_behavior_eval / all_behavioral_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_behavior FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT class.id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 AND ex.b_status = 1 ) AS filled_behavior_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 ) AS all_behavioral_eval FROM tbl_class class INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation e ON e.f_class_id = class.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari_id.id -- 156 ) ) pb ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = pb.class_id
GROUP BY class.id, class.c_start_date, class.c_end_date, csession.c_session_date, std.id, std.emp_no, std.personnel_no, std.national_code, std.first_name, std.last_name, class_std.applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title, personnel.work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa, tbl_job.c_title_fa, department.c_moavenat_title, department.c_omor_title, department.c_ghesmat_title, department.c_vahed_title, class.c_code, course.id, course.c_code, course.c_title_fa, course.e_technical_type, class.c_teaching_type, class.c_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id, class.c_status, institute.c_title_fa, institute.id, course.category_id, course.e_run_type, course.e_theo_type, course.e_level_type, category.id, subcategory.id, teacher.id, teacher.b_personnel, personal.c_first_name_fa, personal.c_last_name_fa, term.c_title_fa, term.id, class.f_planner, class.f_supervisor, class.n_h_duration, teachingmethod.c_title, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass, pr.percent_reaction, pb.percent_behavior

changeSet.author: kasehpour
changeSet.createView:
-- ver 2
with pr as ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ),
pb as ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_behavioral_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_behavior_eval / all_behavioral_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_behavior FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT class.id AS class_id, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 AND ex.b_status = 1 ) AS filled_behavior_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ex.id) FROM tbl_class cx INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation ex ON ex.f_class_id = cx.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari WHERE 1 = 1 AND class.id = cx.id AND ex.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari.id -- 156 ) AS all_behavioral_eval FROM tbl_class class INNER JOIN tbl_evaluation e ON e.f_class_id = class.id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT id AS id FROM tbl_parameter_value v WHERE v.c_code = 'Behavioral' ) raftari_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.f_evaluation_level_id = raftari_id.id -- 156 )
)
SELECT DISTINCT csession.c_session_date AS session_session_date, class.id AS class_id, std.id AS student_id, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1', '2' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24, 1) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '1', '2' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS presence_minute, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3', '4' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24, 1) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_hour, SUM( CASE WHEN att.c_state IN( '3', '4' ) THEN round(to_number(to_date(csession.c_session_end_hour, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(csession.c_session_start_hour, 'HH24:MI' )) * 24 * 60) ELSE 0 END ) AS absence_minute, class.c_code AS class_code, class.c_status AS class_status, class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, class.c_teaching_type AS class_c_teaching_type, class.c_reason AS class_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id AS class_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id AS class_holding_class_type_id, substr(class.c_start_date, 1, 4) AS class_year, class.f_planner AS tclass_planner, class.f_supervisor AS tclass_supervisor, course.c_code AS course_code, course.c_title_fa AS course_title_fa, course.e_technical_type AS course_e_technical_type, class.n_h_duration AS course_duration, teachingmethod.c_title AS teaching_method_title, CASE WHEN course.e_theo_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN course.e_theo_type = 3 THEN '_' ELSE NULL END AS course_theo_type, category.id AS coursecategory, subcategory.id AS coursesubcategory, std.emp_no AS student_emp_no, std.personnel_no AS student_personnel_no, std.national_code AS student_national_code, std.first_name AS student_first_name, std.last_name AS student_last_name, department.c_moavenat_title AS student_ccp_assistant, department.c_omor_title AS student_ccp_affairs, department.c_ghesmat_title AS student_ccp_section, department.c_vahed_title AS student_ccp_unit, class_std.applicant_company_name AS class_student_applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title AS personnel_complex_title, personnel.work_place_title AS student_work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa AS student_post_grade_title, tbl_job.c_title_fa AS student_job_title, personal.c_first_name_fa AS teacher_firstname, personal.c_last_name_fa AS teacher_lastname, teacher.b_personnel AS course_teacher_status, teacher.id AS course_teacher_id, institute.id AS institute_id, institute.c_title_fa AS institute_c_title_fa, term.id AS term_id, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_behavioral_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_behavioral_status, CAST(evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_effectiveness_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_effectiveness_status, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_learning_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_learning_status, CAST(evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_reaction_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_reaction_status, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_results_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_results_status, CAST(evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass AS evaluationanalysis_c_teacher_pass, CASE WHEN evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS evaluationanalysis_b_teacher_status, pr.percent_reaction AS answered_reaction_eval_percent, pb.percent_behavior AS answered_behavioral_eval_percent FROM tbl_attendance att INNER JOIN tbl_student std ON att.f_student = std.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT view_active_personnel.personnel_no, view_active_personnel.national_code, view_active_personnel.complex_title, view_active_personnel.work_place_title, view_active_personnel.post_grade_title, view_active_personnel.f_post_id, view_active_personnel.f_department_id FROM view_active_personnel UNION ALL SELECT tbl_personnel_registered.personnel_no, tbl_personnel_registered.national_code, tbl_personnel_registered.complex_title, tbl_personnel_registered.work_place_title, tbl_personnel_registered.post_grade_title, tbl_personnel_registered.f_post_id, tbl_personnel_registered.f_department_id FROM tbl_personnel_registered ) personnel ON std.national_code = personnel.national_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department department ON department.id = personnel.f_department_id INNER JOIN tbl_session csession ON att.f_session = csession.id INNER JOIN tbl_class class ON csession.f_class_id = class.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute institute ON class.f_institute_organizer = institute.id INNER JOIN tbl_course course ON class.f_course = course.id INNER JOIN tbl_term term ON class.f_term = term.id INNER JOIN tbl_category category ON course.category_id = category.id INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category subcategory ON course.subcategory_id = subcategory.id INNER JOIN tbl_teacher teacher ON class.f_teacher = teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info personal ON teacher.f_personality = personal.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student class_std ON class_std.student_id = std.id AND class_std.class_id = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON personnel.f_post_id = tbl_post.id LEFT JOIN tbl_job ON tbl_job.id = tbl_post.f_job_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_grade ON tbl_post_grade.id = tbl_post.f_post_grade_id LEFT JOIN tbl_evaluation_analysis evaluationanalysis ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = class.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value teachingmethod ON teachingmethod.id = class.f_teaching_method_id -------- LEFT JOIN pr ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = pr.class_id LEFT JOIN pb ON evaluationanalysis.f_tclass = pb.class_id ------- GROUP BY class.id, class.c_start_date, class.c_end_date, csession.c_session_date, std.id, std.emp_no, std.personnel_no, std.national_code, std.first_name, std.last_name, class_std.applicant_company_name, department.c_mojtame_title, personnel.work_place_title, tbl_post_grade.c_title_fa, tbl_job.c_title_fa, department.c_moavenat_title, department.c_omor_title, department.c_ghesmat_title, department.c_vahed_title, class.c_code, course.id, course.c_code, course.c_title_fa, course.e_technical_type, class.c_teaching_type, class.c_reason, class.f_target_population_type_id, class.f_holding_class_type_id, class.c_status, institute.c_title_fa, institute.id, course.category_id, course.e_run_type, course.e_theo_type, course.e_level_type, category.id, subcategory.id, teacher.id, teacher.b_personnel, personal.c_first_name_fa, personal.c_last_name_fa, term.c_title_fa, term.id, class.f_planner, class.f_supervisor, class.n_h_duration, teachingmethod.c_title, evaluationanalysis.c_behavioral_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_behavioral_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_effectiveness_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_effectiveness_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_learning_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_learning_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_reaction_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_reaction_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_results_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_results_pass, evaluationanalysis.c_teacher_grade, evaluationanalysis.b_teacher_pass, pr.percent_reaction, pb.percent_behavior

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT DISTINCT tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_id AS id, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_em_number AS emp_no, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_em_number_10 AS personnel_no, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_address AS address, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_national_code AS national_code, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_birth_city AS birth_place, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_birthdate AS birth_date, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_father_name AS father_name, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_first_name AS first_name, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_last_name AS last_name, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_ssn AS birth_certificate_no, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_mobile AS phone, tbl_md_post_mdms.c_title AS post_title, tbl_md_post_mdms.c_code AS post_code, 0 AS deleted, CASE WHEN tbl_md_people_mdms.c_gender = 'MALE' THEN '' WHEN tbl_md_people_mdms.c_gender = 'FEMALE' THEN '' END AS gender_title, tbl_post.id AS f_post_id, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_inc_dep_code AS department_code, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_inc_dep_title AS department_title, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_area_of_study AS education_field_title, vw_department.c_omor_title AS ccp_affairs, vw_department.c_moavenat_title AS ccp_assistant, vw_department.c_hoze_title AS ccp_area, vw_department.c_code AS ccp_code, vw_department.c_ghesmat_title AS ccp_section, vw_department.c_vahed_title AS ccp_unit, vw_department.c_title AS ccp_title, tbl_md_employee_mdms.p_type AS p_type, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_dep_id AS f_department_id, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_geo_id AS f_geo_id, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_username AS c_username, tbl_md_post_mdms.c_code AS post_grade_code, RTRIM(regexp_replace(tbl_md_post_mdms.c_title, '[0-9]', '')) AS post_grade_title, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_emp_date AS employment_date, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_work_place_title AS work_place_title, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_edu_lvl_title AS education_level_title, tbl_md_job_mdms.c_title AS job_title, CASE WHEN tbl_md_employee_mdms.p_type = 'ContractorPersonal' THEN tbl_md_geo_work_mdms.c_title ELSE ' ' END AS company_name, tbl_md_people_mdms.c_email AS email, tbl_md_employee_status_mdms.c_title AS employment_status_title, tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_emp_status_id as employment_status_id, vw_department.C_MOJTAME_TITLE as complex_title FROM tbl_md_employee_mdms LEFT JOIN tbl_md_people_mdms ON tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_people_id = tbl_md_people_mdms.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_md_post_mdms ON tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_post_id = tbl_md_post_mdms.c_id LEFT JOIN vw_department ON tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_dep_id = vw_department.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_md_post_grade_mdms ON tbl_md_post_mdms.c_grade_id = tbl_md_post_grade_mdms.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_md_job_mdms ON tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_job_code = tbl_md_job_mdms.c_code LEFT JOIN tbl_md_geo_work_mdms ON tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_geo_id = tbl_md_geo_work_mdms.c_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post ON tbl_md_post_mdms.c_code = tbl_post.c_code LEFT JOIN tbl_md_employee_status_mdms ON tbl_md_employee_mdms.c_emp_status_id = tbl_md_employee_status_mdms. c_id
ORDER BY id DESC

changeSet.author: kasehpour
changeSet.createView:
SELECT rownum AS id, res.count_TimeInterference AS count_time_interference , tbl_student.first_name || ' ' || tbl_student.last_name AS student_full_name, res.national_code1 AS national_code, tbl_student.emp_no AS student_work_code, tbl_student.ccp_affairs AS student_affairs, tbl_class.c_title_class AS concurrent_courses, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, tbl_class_student.c_created_by AS adding_user, tbl_class_student.c_last_modified_by AS last_modified_by, res.c_session_date1 AS session_date, res.c_session_start_hour1 AS session_start_hour, res.c_session_end_hour1 AS session_end_hour,
res.session_id AS session_id, tbl_class_student.student_id AS student_id , tbl_class_student.d_created_date AS class_student_d_created_date, tbl_class_student.d_last_modified_date AS class_student_d_last_modified_date
FROM ( SELECT COUNT(national_code) OVER(PARTITION BY national_code,c_session_date, c_session_end_hour, c_session_start_hour) AS count_TimeInterference, national_code AS national_code1, c_session_end_hour AS c_session_end_hour1, c_session_start_hour AS c_session_start_hour1, c_session_date AS c_session_date1, session_id, student_id FROM ( SELECT tbl_session.c_session_date, tbl_session.c_session_start_hour, tbl_session.c_session_end_hour, tbl_student.national_code, tbl_student.id AS student_id , tbl_session.id AS session_id FROM tbl_session INNER JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_session.f_class_id = tbl_class_student.class_id INNER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_class_student.student_id = tbl_student.id where 1=1
-- AND tbl_session.c_session_date >= :startDate -- AND tbl_session.c_session_date <= :endDate
) GROUP BY national_code, c_session_end_hour, c_session_start_hour, c_session_date, session_id, student_id ) res INNER JOIN tbl_session ON res.session_id =tbl_session.id INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_session.f_class_id =tbl_class.id INNER JOIN tbl_student ON res.student_id = tbl_student.id INNER JOIN tbl_class_student ON tbl_session.f_class_id = tbl_class_student.class_id AND res.student_id = tbl_class_student.student_id WHERE res.count_TimeInterference > 1

changeSet.author: kasehpour
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ID ,CALENDAR_ID ,COURSECODE ,MAHALBARGOZARI ,NOEDORE ,HAZINEHDORE ,NAHVEBARGOZARI ,DARKHASTAMOUZESHI ,TARIKHBARGOZARI ,MODATDORE
FROM VIEW_CALENDAR_FINAL_DETAIL

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT ROWNUM AS id, tbl_class.c_code AS class_code, view_complex.c_title AS complex, tbl_class.c_start_date AS class_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date AS class_end_date, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_teacher.b_personnel, CASE WHEN tbl_teacher.b_personnel = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS is_personnel, concat(concat(tbl_personal_info.c_first_name_fa, ' '), tbl_personal_info.c_last_name_fa) AS teacher, tbl_teacher.c_teacher_code AS teacher_national_code, tbl_course.c_code AS course_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa AS course_titlefa, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.c_title_fa AS sub_category_titlefa, tbl_sub_category.id AS sub_category_id, clsstu.total_std AS total_std, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu2.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu2.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_pretest, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu2.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu2.total_std, 2) END AS miangin_asli,
round(((( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu2.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu2.total_std, 2) END ) -( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu2.total_std, 2) * 5 ELSE round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu2.total_std, 2) END
))
/ nullif( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) * 5 ELSE round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) END - CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(minpre.minpre, 2) * 5 ELSE round(minpre.minpre, 2) END , 0)) * 100, 2) AS nerkh,
tbl_evaluation_analysis.c_learning_grade AS learning,
CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) * 5 ELSE round(maxnahaii.maxasli, 2) END AS max_nahaii,
CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_scoring_method = 3 THEN round(minpre.minpre, 2) * 5 ELSE round(minpre.minpre, 2) END AS min_pre,
CASE WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) != 0 AND round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) IS NOT NULL THEN round(((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2) / round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2)) - 1) * 100, 2) WHEN round(pre.mianginpre / clsstu.total_std, 2) = 0 THEN round((round(nahaii.mianginasli / clsstu.total_std, 2)), 2) END AS pishraft, round(javabdadeasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_asli, round(javabdadepre.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_javab_dade_pre, round(ghaboolasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_ghabol, round(noghaboolasli.javabdade / clsstu.total_std, 2) * 100 AS darsad_noghabol, tbl_category.id AS category_id, tbl_teacher.id AS teacher_id, view_assistant.c_title AS moavenat, view_affairs.c_title AS omor, tbl_term.id AS term_id, tbl_term.c_code AS term_code, tbl_institute.c_title_fa AS institute, tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS teaching_method, pr.percent_reaction FROM tbl_evaluation_analysis INNER JOIN tbl_class ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = tbl_class.id LEFT JOIN view_complex ON tbl_class.complex_id = view_complex.id LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON tbl_class.f_teacher = tbl_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info ON tbl_teacher.f_personality = tbl_personal_info.id LEFT JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_class.f_course = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_category ON tbl_course.subcategory_id = tbl_sub_category.id LEFT JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_course.category_id = tbl_category.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) total_std FROM tbl_class_student ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu ON tbl_class.id = clsstu.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(pre) AS mianginpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS pre, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) pre ON tbl_class.id = pre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(asli) AS mianginasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) nahaii ON tbl_class.id = nahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(asli) AS maxasli, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) maxnahaii ON tbl_class.id = maxnahaii.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(asli) AS minpre, classid FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.pre_test_score AS asli, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student ) GROUP BY classid ) minpre ON tbl_class.id = minpre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadeasli ON tbl_class.id = javabdadeasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.pre_test_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) javabdadepre ON tbl_class.id = javabdadepre.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 400 ) OR ( tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 401 ) GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) ghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = ghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS javabdade, tbl_class_student.class_id AS classid FROM tbl_class_student WHERE tbl_class_student.scores_state_id = 403 GROUP BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) noghaboolasli ON tbl_class.id = noghaboolasli.classid LEFT JOIN view_assistant ON tbl_class.assistant_id = view_assistant.id LEFT JOIN view_affairs ON tbl_class.affairs_id = view_affairs.id INNER JOIN tbl_term ON tbl_class.f_term = tbl_term.id INNER JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_class.f_institute = tbl_institute.id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_class.f_teaching_method_id = tbl_parameter_value.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT class_id AS class_id, CASE WHEN all_reaction_eval = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST((filled_reaction_eval / all_reaction_eval) * 100 AS DECIMAL(6, 2)) END AS percent_reaction FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cs.class_id AS class_id, (
