SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 2, 3 ) ) AS filled_reaction_eval, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class c ON cs.class_id = c.id WHERE c.id = classx.id AND cs.evaluation_status_reaction IN ( 0, 1, 2, 3 ) ) AS all_reaction_eval FROM tbl_class_student cs INNER JOIN tbl_class classx ON cs.class_id = classx.id ) ) pr ON tbl_evaluation_analysis.f_tclass = pr.class_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT class_id AS classid, total_std FROM ( SELECT tbl_class_student.class_id, tbl_class_student.student_id, COUNT(*) OVER( PARTITION BY tbl_class_student.class_id ) total_std FROM tbl_class_student WHERE score is not null ) WHERE total_std > 0 ) clsstu2 ON tbl_class.id = clsstu2.classid

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT id, coursecode, noedore, nahvebargozari, hazinehdore, tarikhbargozari, mahalbargozari, categorytitle, darkhastamouzeshi, modatdore, ahdafasli, pishniaz, sarfaslha, calendar_id, c_code, c_title_fa as course_name FROM ( SELECT tbl_class.id, tbl_course.c_code AS coursecode, ( CASE WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 2 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 5 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 6 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 7 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 8 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 9 THEN '' WHEN tbl_course.e_run_type = 10 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS noedore, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS nahvebargozari, tbl_class.c_student_cost || ' ' || tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS hazinehdore, tbl_class.c_start_date || ' ' || tbl_class.c_end_date AS tarikhbargozari, tbl_institute1.c_title_fa mahalbargozari, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS categorytitle, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS darkhastamouzeshi, tbl_class.n_h_duration || ' ' AS modatdore, tbl_skill.c_title_fa ahdafasli, tbl_course1.c_title_fa AS pishniaz, tbl_syllabus.c_title_fa AS sarfaslha, tbl_class.calendar_id, tbl_class.c_code, tbl_course.c_title_fa FROM tbl_class LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_institute.id = tbl_class.f_institute_organizer INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_class.f_course LEFT JOIN tbl_institute tbl_institute1 ON tbl_institute1.id = tbl_class.f_institute LEFT JOIN tbl_class_training_place ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_training_place ON tbl_training_place.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_training_place_id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_category.id = tbl_course.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_parameter_value.id = tbl_class.f_student_cost_currency LEFT JOIN tbl_skill ON tbl_course.id = tbl_skill.f_main_objective_course LEFT JOIN tbl_pre_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_pre_course.f_course_id LEFT JOIN tbl_course tbl_course1 ON tbl_course1.id = tbl_pre_course.f_pre_course_id LEFT JOIN tbl_course_goal ON tbl_course_goal.f_course_id = tbl_course.id LEFT JOIN tbl_syllabus ON tbl_syllabus.f_goal = tbl_course_goal.f_goal_id )

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT id, LISTAGG(ahdafasli, ';' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY ahdafasli ) AS ahdafasli, calendar_id, c_code, course_name, coursecode as course_code FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.ahdafasli, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code, view_calendar_detail.coursecode, view_calendar_detail.course_name FROM view_calendar_detail ) GROUP BY id, calendar_id, c_code, course_name, coursecode

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView:
SELECT id, LISTAGG(pishniaz, ';' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY pishniaz ) AS pishniaz, calendar_id,c_code, course_name, coursecode as course_code FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.pishniaz, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code, view_calendar_detail.coursecode, view_calendar_detail.course_name
FROM view_calendar_detail ) GROUP BY id, calendar_id,c_code, course_name, coursecode

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.coursecode, view_calendar_detail.noedore, view_calendar_detail.nahvebargozari, view_calendar_detail.hazinehdore, view_calendar_detail.tarikhbargozari, view_calendar_detail.mahalbargozari, view_calendar_detail.categorytitle, view_calendar_detail.darkhastamouzeshi, view_calendar_detail.modatdore, view_calendar_of_main_goals.ahdafasli, view_calendar_prerequisite.pishniaz, view_calendar_headline.sarfaslha, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code, view_calendar_of_main_goals.course_name FROM view_calendar_detail INNER JOIN view_calendar_of_main_goals ON view_calendar_of_main_goals.id = view_calendar_detail.id INNER JOIN view_calendar_prerequisite ON view_calendar_prerequisite.id = view_calendar_detail.id INNER JOIN view_calendar_headline ON view_calendar_headline.id = view_calendar_detail.id

changeSet.author: kasehpour
changeSet.createView: SELECT view_calendar_final_detail.id, view_calendar_final_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_final_detail.coursecode, view_calendar_final_detail.mahalbargozari, view_calendar_final_detail.noedore, view_calendar_final_detail.hazinehdore, view_calendar_final_detail.nahvebargozari, view_calendar_final_detail.darkhastamouzeshi, view_calendar_final_detail.tarikhbargozari, view_calendar_final_detail.modatdore, view_calendar_final_detail.course_name FROM view_calendar_final_detail

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT id, LISTAGG(sarfaslha, ';' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY sarfaslha ) AS sarfaslha, calendar_id, c_code, course_name, coursecode FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT view_calendar_detail.id, view_calendar_detail.sarfaslha, view_calendar_detail.calendar_id, view_calendar_detail.c_code, view_calendar_detail.course_name, view_calendar_detail.coursecode FROM view_calendar_detail ) GROUP BY id, calendar_id, c_code, course_name, coursecode

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT view_calendar_educational_calendar.id, tbl_session.c_day_name, tbl_session.c_session_date, tbl_session.c_session_start_hour, tbl_session.c_session_end_hour, view_calendar_educational_calendar.calendar_id, view_calendar_educational_calendar.classcode FROM view_calendar_educational_calendar INNER JOIN tbl_session ON tbl_session.f_class_id = view_calendar_educational_calendar.id

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT tbl_class.id, tbl_class.c_code AS classcode, tbl_course.c_code AS coursecode, tbl_class.c_title_class AS onvanclass, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_teaching_brand = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS nahvebargozari, tbl_class.c_student_cost || ' ' || tbl_parameter_value.c_title AS hazinehdore, tbl_class.c_start_date || ' ' || tbl_class.c_end_date AS tarikhbargozari, tbl_institute1.c_title_fa mahalbargozari, tbl_course.category_id, tbl_category.c_title_fa AS categorytitle, ( CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 1 THEN '' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_reason = 3 THEN ' ' ELSE NULL END ) AS darkhastamouzeshi, tbl_class.n_h_duration || ' ' AS modatdore, tbl_class.c_start_date, tbl_class.c_end_date, ' ' || tbl_class.n_group AS n_group, CASE WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 1 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 2 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 3 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 4 THEN ' ' WHEN tbl_class.c_status = 5 THEN '' END AS class_status, tbl_class.calendar_id, tbl_course.c_title_fa as course_name FROM tbl_class LEFT JOIN tbl_institute ON tbl_institute.id = tbl_class.f_institute_organizer INNER JOIN tbl_course ON tbl_course.id = tbl_class.f_course LEFT JOIN tbl_institute tbl_institute1 ON tbl_institute1.id = tbl_class.f_institute LEFT JOIN tbl_class_training_place ON tbl_class.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_class_id LEFT JOIN tbl_training_place ON tbl_training_place.id = tbl_class_training_place.f_training_place_id INNER JOIN tbl_category ON tbl_category.id = tbl_course.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_parameter_value ON tbl_parameter_value.id = tbl_class.f_student_cost_currency

changeSet.author: namdari
changeSet.createView: SELECT view_calendar_educational_calendar.id, tbl_session.c_day_name, tbl_session.c_session_date, tbl_session.c_session_start_hour, tbl_session.c_session_end_hour, view_calendar_educational_calendar.calendar_id, view_calendar_educational_calendar.classcode, view_calendar_educational_calendar.coursecode, view_calendar_educational_calendar.course_name FROM view_calendar_educational_calendar INNER JOIN tbl_session ON tbl_session.f_class_id = view_calendar_educational_calendar.id
